question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: "One Pot" Dinner(Makes A Big Hit ... Especially With The Men.)
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef
3/4 lb. bacon, cut in small pieces
1 c. chopped onion
2 (1 lb. 15 oz. size) cans pork and beans
1 (1 lb.) can kidney beans, drained
1 (1 lb.) can butter limas, drained
1 c. ketchup
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
3 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet; drain off fat and put beef in crock-pot.
Brown bacon and onions; drain off fat.
Add bacon, onions and remaining ingredients to crock-pot.
Stir together well.
Cover and cook on low 4 to 6 hours.
If using the 2-quart crock-pot, reduce this recipe by half.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for a one-pot meal that specifically includes beef as one of the main ingredients. It lists all necessary ingredients and gives step-by-step instructions on how to prepare the dish, making it fully relevant to the question. The inclusion of ground beef and a crock-pot method aligns with the request for a one-pot beef recipe.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One-Pot Meal
Ingredients:
1 to 2 lb. stew beef (boneless and extra lean)
carrots, as many as you think you need
potatoes, as many as you think you need
1 large onion
1 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix together in crock-pot and cook on low while you are at work.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One Pot Meal
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 large can corn
4 large sliced potatoes
1 large sliced onion
1 large can tomatoes
3 large sliced carrots
1/2 c. ketchup
1 Tbsp. mustard
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Make patties out of ground beef.
Sprinkle salt and pepper on each one.
In a large Dutch oven or pot, place a layer of patties. Add a layer of all vegetables.
Repeat layers until you have used all ingredients.
Mix ketchup, mustard and water; pour over top. Cook on medium until it starts to boil.
Turn stove on low heat; cook for 1 1/2 hours.
May need to add more water, depending on stove variations.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the user's request for a one-pot beef recipe. question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One-Pot Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 c. chopped celery
3/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. uncooked medium egg noodles
1 can (16 oz) kidney beans rinsed & drained
1 can (14 1/2 oz) stewed tomatoes
3/4 c. water
1 beef bouillon cube
Directions:

Stir in noodles, beans, tomatoes, water and bouillon.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until noodles are tender.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
4 cooked chicken breasts (skinless), cut in pieces
1 can mushrooms
1/4 c. liquid Butter Buds
1/4 c. flour
4 tsp. fat free chicken broth
1/3 c. low-fat Parmesan
1/4 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
10 to 12 oz. cooked fettucine
1 c. evaporated skim milk
Directions:
In saucepan over low heat, blend flour, liquid Butter Buds, skim milk and chicken broth.
Add minced garlic, salt and pepper. Continue to cook over low heat stirring constantly until the sauce thickens.
Stir in Parmesan cheese.
Combine sauce with chicken and mushrooms.
Fold into cooked pasta.
Serve immediately.
explanation: The answer provides a method for creating a chicken alfredo dish, which is relevant to the user's question about how to make classic chicken alfredo. question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. oregano
4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
2 chicken broiler fryers, halved
1 c. flour
4 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Combine oil, lemon juice, Parmesan cheese, oregano, 2 teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
Beat well.
Pour over chicken halves. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or longer.
Combine remaining ingredients, except butter.
Remove chicken from marinade and roll in the flour mixture.
Saute chicken in butter until browned on both sides.
Place each chicken half, skin side up, in center of a double thick square of heavy-duty aluminum foil.
Bring up sides and ends and seal with tight folds.
Place packets on baking sheet and bake at 425° for 1 hour.
Makes 4 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for Chicken Alfredo, which includes cooking chicken. However, it lacks the specific instructions for making the classic chicken alfredo sauce, which typically includes pasta, butter, cream, Parmesan cheese, and garlic. While it partially addresses the preparation of chicken, it doesn't fully cover the requirements for a classic chicken alfredo dish.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Classic Alfredo Pasta
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) pkg. uncooked fettuccine
1/2 c. butter or oleo
1 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. heavy or whipping cream
4 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
Directions:
Cook fettuccine according to your taste of doneness; drain. Meanwhile, in small saucepan, melt butter over medium heat; gradually stir in cheese, then cream until well blended.
Continue heating sauce, stirring constantly, just to boiling point.
Remove from heat; stir in parsley.
Add sauce to hot fettuccine; toss lightly.
Serves 6.
explanation: The provided answer gives instructions for making a classic Alfredo sauce, which is a component of a chicken alfredo dish. However, it omits essential components such as the chicken and does not provide a complete recipe for a classic chicken alfredo. While the sauce recipe is relevant, it is not sufficient on its own to answer the user's question about making the full dish.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts, boned
2 slices bacon
1 tsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 pt. light cream
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/3 c. frozen peas
1 chopped scallion
fresh ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. white wine
Directions:
Cut bacon into small pieces and chicken into about 1-inch cubes.
Add garlic and oil into hot skillet; cook until chicken is done.
Remove from skillet.
Reheat pan and add wine so that it picks up flavors from skillet.
Slowly add cream, scallions, cayenne pepper, oregano and peas.
Mix cornstarch with about 4 ounces water.
Add a little at a time until you get a creamy sauce.
Add chicken and bacon mixture; heat.
Add black pepper to taste.
Serve over pasta.
Shrimp may be substituted for chicken.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for Chicken Alfredo, which directly addresses the query about making a classic chicken alfredo. It lists all the necessary ingredients and includes step-by-step cooking instructions, substituting shrimp for chicken as an alternative, which is also relevant to the query.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 c. sliced green onions and tops
1 1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
lemon slices (for garnish)
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and paprika in paper or plastic bag. Brush chicken with lemon juice.
Place a few pieces at a time in bag.
Shake to coat.
Heat oil to 365° in electric skillet or large heavy skillet.
Add chicken.
Brown.
Combine water and bouillon granules.
Stir until dissolved.
Add brown sugar and remaining lemon juice.
Pour into skillet.
Cover.
Reduce heat to 250°; simmer 5 minutes.
Turn chicken.
Sprinkle with onion and lemon peel.
Recover.
Simmer 10 minutes.
Serve garnish with lemon slices and additional parsley.
Serves 4.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making tangy lemon chicken, which directly addresses the user's question. It includes all the necessary ingredients and step-by-step instructions, ensuring that someone following the recipe can achieve the desired result. The inclusion of specific measurements, ingredients, and cooking techniques aligns with the request for how to make a tangy lemon chicken dish.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. oleo
1/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. onion salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Dip cut up fryer parts in sauce. Place chicken, skin side down, in shallow pan.
Pour sauce over chicken.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
explanation: The answer provides a tangy chicken recipe but does not specifically mention lemon as a key ingredient or as a method to achieve tanginess in the dish, which is crucial to the user's question about making tangy lemon chicken. While the recipe includes lemon juice, it lacks details on incorporating lemon flavor throughout the preparation process, which is essential for achieving a tangy flavor profile.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
2 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 c. water
1/3 to 1/2 c. lemon juice
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
2 Tbsp. butter
2 egg yolks, slightly beaten
Directions:
Combine sugar and cornstarch in saucepan.
Gradually add water, blending until smooth.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick and clear.
Remove from heat. Blend about 1/2 cup of hot mixture in saucepan and cook 2 minutes. Add lemon rind, lemon juice and butter.
Serve warm or cold. Sauce may be refrigerated and reheated.
Yields 2 3/4 cups.
explanation: The provided answer outlines how to make a tangy lemon sauce, which could be part of a tangy lemon chicken recipe. However, it lacks specific information on how to prepare the chicken itself, such as cooking methods, additional seasonings, or instructions on combining the sauce with the chicken. While it addresses the tangy aspect with lemon juice and rind, it does not fully encompass the comprehensive process required for a tangy lemon chicken dish.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/3 c. chicken broth
1/3 c. fresh lemon juice
1/2 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. lemon zest
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
3/4 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 2 large), cut the chicken in strips
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/3 c. cooking oil
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch, dissolved in 1 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. toasted sesame seeds
Directions:
Toast sesame seeds by swirling in a nonstick skillet until they smell nutty.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
4 whole chicken breasts, halved, boned and skinned
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. clarified butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. Madeira wine
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 large lemon, cut in 6 slices
3 Tbsp. capers
1 tsp. chopped pimento
1/4 c. fresh chives
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fettuccine, cooked according to package
Directions:
Pound chicken breasts to 1/4-inch thickness between 2 pieces of waxed paper.
Mix salt, pepper, paprika and flour in a plastic bag; add chicken, one piece at a time, and shake to coat.
Place butter and oil in a saute pan or large skillet; heat over medium heat until bubbly.
Add garlic and chicken; saute, turning, about 6 minutes or until chicken is brown and fork can be easily inserted.
Drain on paper towels and keep warm.
Drain all but 2 tablespoons of cooking fat from pan; add wine and deglaze pan, scraping up brown bits.
Add lemon juice and heat 1 minute; return chicken to pan; add lemon slices and heat 2 minutes.
Add capers and pimento.
Sprinkle chives over all.
explanation: The answer directly addresses the question of how to make tangy lemon chicken by providing a clear recipe. It includes all the necessary ingredients and steps, such as the use of fresh lemon juice, lemon slices, capers, and pimento, which contribute to the tangy flavor profile of the dish. The ingredients and cooking directions are specifically tailored to achieve the tangy taste described in the question.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: My Best Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, finely chopped
5 large cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 lb. ground beef
1/4 lb. pork sausage
3 Tbsp. Contadina tomato paste
1 (28 oz.) can Contadina whole tomatoes, chopped with juice
1 (8 oz.) can Contadina tomato sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. crushed thyme
2 tsp. crushed basil
3/4 tsp. crushed oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 (15 oz.) carton part-skim Ricotta cheese
1 egg, well beaten
1 tsp. dried parsley
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese, divided
1 1/3 c. grated Mozzarella cheese, divided
8 lasagna noodles
Directions:
Prepare meat
sauce.
In a 3-quart saucepan, heat olive oil; add
chopped onion and saute about 3 minutes.
Add garlic and red pepper; saute 1 minute.
Add ground beef and sausage. Brown meat, then drain off fat.
Add chopped tomatoes, paste, sauce,
sugar, salt, pepper, thyme, basil and oregano.
Bring to a
boil;
lower heat
and
simmer, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making lasagna, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make homemade lasagna. It includes a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions, which are essential elements for preparing this dish. Therefore, it is relevant and useful for someone seeking to cook lasagna at home.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
3 lb. ground beef
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 small diced onion
1/4 c. diced green pepper
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
5 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1 can water
1/2 c. ketchup
4 c. Mozzarella cheese
1 pkg. lasagna noodles
Directions:
Brown meat; add onions, green peppers and oil.
Add all the spices, seasonings, tomato sauce, ketchup and water.
Simmer until thick, about 1 hour.
Cook 1 package lasagna according to the package.
I add 1 tablespoon oil to water so noodles don't stick. Layer noodles, then sauce (about 1 1/2 cups per layer), then Mozzarella cheese in a 9 x 13-inch pan, 3 layers high.
Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for homemade lasagna, listing all necessary ingredients and detailed cooking directions. It directly addresses the user's question on how to make lasagna at home, making it a relevant and useful response.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 tsp. shortening, vegetable spray or oil
3 Tbsp. oil
1 (at least) garlic clove
2 c. mushrooms, cleaned and sliced
2 c. green pepper, seeded, cored and sliced
12 to 16 oz. spinach, well washed, rinsed, drained and chopped (I've used chopped, frozen and it works)
2 eggs, beaten, or equivalent of Egg Beater type
1 lb. tofu, drained and crumbled
3/4 tsp. oregano
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. fresh parsley (at least), washed, dried, stems removed and rinsed
5 c. Marinara sauce or tomato sauce (canned or homemade)
12 oz. lasagna noodles, cooked
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese (light skim), shredded
3 oz. fresh Parmesan cheese, shredded or grated
Directions:
Spray 9 x 13-inch baking dish with shortening or vegetable spray/oil.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for vegetable lasagna which includes ingredients and methods that could be used to make homemade lasagna. However, it does not directly address the creation of traditional meat-based lasagna, which is what the initial question seems to imply. question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 1/2 tsp. dry garlic salad mix
2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes
1 lb. hamburg
4 slices bread, crumbled
1/4 c. milk
2 slightly beaten eggs
2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. chopped parsley
2 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 c. water
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. fennel seed
1 tsp. dry basil
1 lb. lasagna
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
Directions:
Melt 4 tablespoons margarine in a large saucepan.
Add chopped onions, salad mix and tomatoes.
Simmer until liquid is evaporated. Mix into tomato mixture, tomato paste, water, sugar, 1/4 cup parsley, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, fennel seed, basil and 1 teaspoon salt.
Simmer 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Mix hamburg and bread crumbs in large bowl.
Add 1/4 cup milk, eggs, 1/4 cup parsley, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Mix with hands until well moistened.
Brown in 2 tablespoons margarine. Drain and add to tomato mixture.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for lasagna, which is a key component of making homemade lasagna. However, it omits crucial steps such as preparing the sauce separately, layering the ingredients, and baking the lasagna, which are essential parts of the process. Therefore, while it touches on some aspects of the question, it does not fully address the process of making homemade lasagna.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. whole basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 lb. can tomatoes
1 (12 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
8 oz. egg noodles
3 c. creamed cottage cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan and Romano cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 beaten eggs
1/2 Tbsp. + 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced thin
Directions:
Brown beef; spoon off fat.
Add next 7 ingredients.
Simmer approximately 30 minutes.
Cook noodles; rinse and combine remaining ingredients in bowl except Mozzarella cheese.
Layer noodles, cottage cheese, Mozzarella, then meat sauce.
Repeat. Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.
Let stand 10 minutes before cutting into squares.
explanation: The answer provided is a recipe for lasagna, which directly addresses the user's query on how to make homemade lasagna. It lists all required ingredients and gives step-by-step directions for preparation and cooking, making it a relevant and useful response to the question.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 c. butter
2 eggs
3/4 c. milk
5 apples
1/4 c. currants
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Work butter in mix.
Beat egg; add milk and stir dry ingredients.
Spread dough in a well-buttered biscuit pan.
Spread apples on dough, pressing sharp edges of fruit into mixture.
Sprinkle with currants, sugar and cinnamon which has been mixed.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
explanation: The provided answer suggests a recipe for Apple Chip Cake, which involves baking apples in a cake form with currants, sugar, and cinnamon. This recipe does not align with the request for 'baked apple chips', which typically refer to thinly sliced apples that are baked until crispy. The cooking method and final product differ significantly, rendering the answer non-relevant to the question asked.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 3/4 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. chopped apples
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Beat together eggs and sugar.
Add vegetable oil.
In large bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon.
Slowly mix dry ingredients into egg mixture.
Blend well.
Fold in apples and nuts.
Spread into a greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes.
explanation: The provided answer is for a recipe to make an Apple Chip Cake, which is a baked dessert, not baked apple chips. The ingredients and method described do not align with the preparation of baked apple chips, which typically involve thinly slicing and baking apples until crisp. question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
3 c. peeled, chopped apples
1 c. chopped nuts
raisins
3 c. flour (I use 1/2 whole wheat)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Blend oil, sugar and eggs well.
Stir in apples, nuts and raisins.
Add flour, vanilla, baking soda and cinnamon.
Bake about 1 hour in greased 13 x 9-inch pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
3 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
3 c. apples, cubed

Directions:
Mix oil, sugar and eggs.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Apple Cake
Ingredients:
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 c. white sugar
2 eggs
1/2 c. shortening
1 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon

Directions:

Sift dry ingredients together and add alternately with buttermilk. Add diced apples.
Mix chocolate chips, cinnamon and white sugar. Sprinkle over above mixture.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
40 mushrooms (medium size), washed, caps whole, stems removed
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. rosemary
freshly ground pepper
2 c. chicken bouillon
1/2 c. wild rice
1 shallot
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. chopped almonds
fresh lemon
Directions:
Bring bouillon to a boil.
Add washed wild rice; cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Saute mushroom caps in butter.
Mix rice, almonds, herbs and spices and fill mushroom caps.
Drizzle with fresh lemon juice.
Bake on cookie sheet at 300° for 15 minutes.
May easily be prepared a day prior to re-heating.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe involving mushrooms and some savory elements like thyme, rosemary, pepper, and almonds, which align with the theme of making a savory mushroom sauce. question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushroom Caps
Ingredients:
12 to 14 medium to large mushroom caps
1/4 c. finely diced onion
1/4 c. finely diced celery
1/4 c. finely diced green peppers
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
3 oz. softened cream cheese
1 c. finely ground bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In a large skillet, saute onion, celery and green pepper in butter until slightly softened.
Add cream cheese and stir.
Add bread crumbs, lemon juice, salt and pepper; mix well.
Stuff mushroom caps with mixture (mushrooms should be washed and laid on paper towel to dry until needed).
Place on greased baking sheet and bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes.
May be put under broiler if you want them browned more.
Serve warm.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for stuffed mushrooms, which involves using mushrooms. However, it does not specifically address how to make a savory mushroom sauce. It focuses on preparing mushrooms for stuffing, rather than creating a sauce to accompany or go with the mushrooms.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium can mushrooms
4 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. rich milk
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter.
Add flour slowly and brown slightly.
Add milk and cook until it thickens.
Pour over steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Patties
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. minced onion
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. fine bread crumbs
1 egg
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. oil
1 can golden mushroom soup
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Combine meat, salt, onion, mustard, 1/4 cup crumbs, egg and Worcestershire sauce.
Mix very well and shape into 6 patties.
Put the 1/2 cup crumbs on a piece of waxed paper and press patties onto it so the crumbs adhere to the outside.
Heat the oil in a frypan. Brown patties on both sides.
Turn down heat.
Drain off any fat from pan.
Open soup and add 1/4 cup water.
Pour over patties. Simmer for 20 to 25 minutes.
Serve with cooked egg noodles. Sprinkle with chopped chives.
You can substitute turkey for all or part of beef.
explanation: The provided answer details a recipe for savory patties using ground beef, onions, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, bread crumbs, egg, oil, golden mushroom soup, and water. However, it does not address the specific request for making a savory mushroom sauce. The instructions involve cooking patties, not creating a sauce, hence it is not relevant to the question about making a mushroom sauce.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
frozen wings
vegetable oil (for deep frying)
1 stick butter
1/2 c. ketchup
3/4 bottle Durkee red hot sauce
1/4 Tabasco (small bottle)
pinch of salt
pinch of pepper
1 Tbsp. chili pepper
1 tsp. red pepper
Directions:
Combine butter, ketchup, Durkee, Tabasco, salt, pepper, chili pepper and red pepper in pot over low heat.
Cook until butter is melted and sauce is warm.
(If too spicy, add ketchup.
If you like it hotter, add Tabasco.)

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chinese-Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. (about 16) chicken wings
2 eggs, slightly beaten
2/3 c. milk
1 c. all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
salt
vegetable oil (for deep frying)
Directions:
Cut off wing tips at joints; discard these.
Cut other sections at joint, also.
Mix eggs, milk, flour, soy sauce and salt. Dip pieces of chicken in batter and fry in hot deep oil, 350° on frying thermometer.
Fry Daddy type until hot and crisp. Drain on paper towels; may need to sprinkle more salt.
Makes about 32 pieces.
explanation: The answer provides a method for making fried chicken wings using deep frying, but it does not address making crispy air fryer chicken wings. The instructions are for a traditional deep-fried recipe, not using an air fryer. While it mentions frying at a precise temperature, the cooking method does not align with the air fryer process. An air fryer recipe would involve different steps, such as coating the chicken and setting the air fryer to the correct temperature and cooking time.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
2/3 c. whole wheat or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. buttermilk
12 chicken wings
Directions:
In 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch roasting pan in 425° oven, melt butter.
Remove pan from oven.
On wax paper, mix next 5 ingredients.
Pour buttermilk into small bowl.
Dip one wing at a time in buttermilk, then in crumb mixture.
Place wings in melted butter in roasting pan, turning to coat evenly.
Bake 35 minutes or until chicken wings are tender.
explanation: The provided answer discusses a method for making oven-fried chicken wings using a roasting pan in an oven. This method does not align with the query for making crispy air fryer chicken wings. The air fryer method would differ significantly, involving a different cooking appliance and potentially different preparation steps to achieve a crispy outcome without oil or butter.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wing Recipe
Ingredients:
24 chicken wings (about 4 lb.)
salt (optional)
freshly ground black pepper
4 c. vegetable or corn oil
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 to 5 tsp. hot sauce (Frank's Original Red Hot Sauce is the local favorite)
1 tsp. white vinegar
Directions:
Cut off tips and separate each wing at the joint.
Sprinkle wings with salt and pepper to taste.
Heat oil in deep-fat fryer or large heavy pot.
When it is quite hot, add half the wings and cook about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
When wings are golden brown and crisp, remove them and drain well.
Add remaining wings and repeat process.
Meanwhile, melt butter in saucepan, add hot sauce to taste and vinegar.
Pour hot sauce over wings and shake in bucket.
Serve with Blue Cheese dressing and celery sticks.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for chicken wings, which could be used for air fryer wings. However, it specifically mentions deep-fat frying, which is different from air frying. The answer omits crucial air fryer-specific instructions, such as temperature settings and cooking time adjustments for air fryers, which are key to achieving crispy air fryer chicken wings. Despite this, it does address the core topic of cooking chicken wings, making it partially relevant.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Broccoli Soup
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. minced onion
9 Tbsp. oleo
3/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. flour
4 1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. grated carrots
9 c. milk
9 c. consomme or 4 1/2 c. and 4 1/2 c. water
30 chopped broccoli florets
Directions:
Saute onion in butter until tender.
Stir in flour and salt; gradually add milk, stirring constantly, in double boiler.
Bring to a boil.
Add broth; cook over low heat until serving time. Approximately 30 minutes before serving, add carrots and broccoli. Stir occasionally, but do not boil.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a creamy broccoli soup, but it lacks the crucial component of cheddar cheese, which is essential for a creamy broccoli cheddar soup. It addresses some aspects of the original question, such as using broccoli and creating a creamy soup, but it omits a key ingredient and does not fully meet the user's request for a recipe that includes cheddar.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. broccoli, diced
3 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
5 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
1 c. whipping cream
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
Saute broccoli in butter over medium heat until tender. Sprinkle with flour and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes.
Gradually stir in stock and milk.
Heat just to simmering.
Stir in cream and cheese.
Allow cheese to melt in soup.
Season to taste and serve with croutons.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for broccoli and cheddar soup, which includes all the necessary ingredients and steps needed to make a creamy broccoli cheddar soup. The ingredients list and the directions align with the user's request for a recipe, making it relevant and useful.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 stick butter
1/4 c. flour
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. chicken broth
2 1/2 c. milk
2 c. broccoli, cooked slightly
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender.
Stir in flour, salt and pepper.
Cook and stir until smooth.
Add broth and milk all at once.
Cook until thick.
Add broccoli; simmer and stir.
Remove from heat and stir in cheese until melted.
explanation: The provided answer fully addresses the user's question for a creamy broccoli cheddar soup recipe. It lists all necessary ingredients and provides a step-by-step method of preparation, including the cooking process and the final step of adding cheese to achieve the creamy texture. The recipe is complete and directly related to the user's request for a creamy broccoli cheddar soup recipe.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Broccoli Soup(6 Cups)
Ingredients:
1 lb. broccoli florets
2 tsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small garlic clove, minced
1/4 c. flour
3 c. chicken stock
1/8 tsp. dried basil
1/8 tsp. dried oregano
1/8 tsp. dried tarragon
1/8 tsp. dried thyme
1 c. milk
1 to 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Drop broccoli into boiling water.
Cook until tender 7 minutes.
Drain.
In saucepan, combine oil and onion; saute until soft.
Add garlic and cook 15 seconds longer.
Sprinkle on flour and stir.
explanation: The provided answer includes a recipe for creamy broccoli soup, but it lacks the inclusion of cheddar cheese, which is a key ingredient in creamy broccoli cheddar soup. Therefore, while it addresses the broccoli soup component, it does not fully satisfy the specific request for a cheddar cheese-infused version of the soup.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Broccoli Bake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. broccoli or 1 medium head cauliflower, separated into florets
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can mushroom soup
1/4 c. milk
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar
1 c. Bisquick
Directions:
Heat salted water to a boil.
Add broccoli.
Cover and heat to boiling.
Cook 10 to 12 minutes until stems are almost tender. Drain.
Place broccoli in ungreased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Heat oven to 400°.
explanation: The answer provided is related to a recipe that includes broccoli, which is a main ingredient in the requested creamy broccoli cheddar soup. However, it focuses on a 'Creamy Broccoli Bake' instead, which lacks the cheddar cheese component and does not provide a soup-specific preparation method. The recipe is not fully relevant to the question, as it omits key elements of the creamy broccoli cheddar soup.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese(Kids In The Kitchen)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped carrot
1/2 c. chopped celery
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes or tomato puree
1 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1/2 lb. ground sirloin or ground beef
1 lb. spaghetti or ziti, cooked according to pkg. directions
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet. Add onion, carrots and celery. Saute over low-medium heat, stirring frequently, about 10 minutes. Stir in garlic. Saute 2 minutes more.
Add tomato sauce to skillet. Add basil and oregano. Stir.
Cook, covered, on medium-low heat for about 10 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a pasta dish, but it does not specify if it's a 'classic spaghetti bolognese'. The ingredients and steps seem related, but the title and the lack of mention of the traditional ingredients like tomato paste, red wine, and pancetta or guanciale make it only partially relevant to the request for a classic spaghetti bolognese recipe.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghettini Bolognese
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 carrot, sliced
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 c. each chopped onion, celery and green pepper
2 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 lb. Italian sausage, casing removed
2 (15 oz.) cans Hunt's tomato sauce
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. dry red wine (optional)
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian seasoning
Directions:
Saute mushrooms, carrot, garlic, onion, celery and green pepper in Wesson oil in Dutch oven.
Add sausage; cook until sausage loses redness.
Drain fat.
Add remaining ingredients. Simmer, uncovered, 40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over hot, cooked spaghettini.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the request for a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese. It lists all the necessary ingredients and provides a step-by-step procedure that corresponds to the traditional preparation of the dish. The recipe includes typical elements found in a bolognese sauce, such as mushrooms, carrots, garlic, onions, celery, green pepper, Italian sausage, and tomato sauce, along with suggested cooking times and serving instructions. Therefore, it is a relevant answer to the user's question.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
1 slice root celery or 2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned whole tomatoes or 3 Tbsp. tomato puree
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/3 c. white wine or chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
In a skillet saute ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat loses its pinkness then transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion then dice celery and carrot.
Chop ham into small pieces and saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Transfer to pan with ground meat and combine all.
Add water, tomatoes or tomato puree, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme.
Cover and cook for about 20 minutes, then add the wine or chicken broth and cook for a few more minutes.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant to the question as it offers a complete recipe for Pasta Bolognese, which aligns with the request for a classic spaghetti bolognese. The ingredients and steps detailed are typical of a bolognese sauce that can be served over spaghetti, making it a suitable recipe for the user's needs.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned tomatoes
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. thyme
1/3 c. chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
Brown ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat is done. Transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion; dice celery and carrot. Chop ham into small pieces.
Saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Add to ground meat.
Add water, tomatoes, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme; cover and cook about 20 minutes. Add chicken broth; cook a few minutes more.
Cook pasta according to package directions; drain well.
Serve immediately with sauce.
explanation: The answer provided is a complete recipe for Pasta Bolognese, which includes a list of ingredients and step-by-step cooking instructions. These details directly address the user's request for a classic spaghetti bolognese recipe, thus it is relevant to the question.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Bolog'Nase
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 lb. Italian sausage
2 medium onions, chopped
1 carrot, thinly sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 rib celery
1 green pepper
2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1/2 c. water or 1/4 c. red wine
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian herb seasoning (increase to taste)
basil, oregano, garlic and red pepper
Directions:
Saut mushrooms, carrot, onions and green pepper in oil. Add sausage and cook until sausage is done. Drain well. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer 40 minutes (or longer).
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for Spaghetti Bolognese, listing all necessary ingredients and step-by-step instructions for preparation, which directly addresses the user's request for a classic spaghetti bolognese recipe.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Dumb Bunny Carrots (Marinated)
Ingredients:
1 can tomato soup
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. mustard
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
5 c. cooked, sliced carrots
1 large green pepper, diced
1 large onion, diced
Directions:
Mix soup, oil, vinegar, mustard, salt, pepper, sugar and Worcestershire sauce in pan and bring to a boil.
Pour over carrots, green pepper and onion.
Mix and refrigerate at least 24 hours before serving.
Great for holidays.
Can be made in advance and last a long time in fridge.
explanation: The provided answer is a recipe for 'Dumb Bunny Carrots (Marinated)', which includes a list of ingredients and directions for preparation. However, this recipe does not incorporate chickpeas, which are a key component of the user's question. question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.
explanation: The answer provided is a recipe for Indian Chickpeas, which includes chickpeas as a main ingredient. However, it does not specifically mention carrots, even though it could be considered partially relevant since it gives a complete recipe using chickpeas. The inclusion of potatoes and garnish could potentially suggest an alternative method of incorporating carrots into the dish, but this is not explicitly stated. Thus, the answer addresses some aspects but omits the key part of the question regarding the use of both chickpeas and carrots.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.
explanation: The answer is relevant as it provides a recipe (Chickpea Soup) that includes both chickpeas and carrots as a base ingredient. Although the original question did not list carrots, chickpea soup naturally integrates carrots, and the instructions detail the steps to create a meal that includes chickpeas. The answer directly addresses the question by providing a relevant recipe that can be made using chickpeas, which are one of the primary ingredients asked about in the question.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Herbed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 bunch carrots
1 c. boiling water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. marjoram (dried)
1/4 tsp. savory (dried)
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
Directions:
Scrape carrots.
Cut into quarters (lengthwise), then halves (lengthwise).
Cook in hot water and salt, covered.
Cook 15 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
Add herbs and butter.
explanation: The provided answer is partly relevant as it gives a recipe for cooking carrots, which are one of the ingredients mentioned in the question. question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that includes chickpeas as a primary ingredient. However, it does not mention carrots, which are a part of the user's question. The recipe does not fully address the query, but it does provide a relevant use of chickpeas, making it partly relevant. To be considered relevant, the response should have included carrots or at least acknowledged the possibility of including them with chickpeas.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. rotini pasta
1/2 c. diced Provolone cheese
1 can pitted black olives
4 c. assorted vegetables
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Italian dressing
2 oz. Prosciutto, slivered
1/2 c. sliced red onion
1/2 c. frozen peas, thawed
2 Tbsp. fresh basil
1 avocado
Directions:
In a large bowl, gently toss pasta with dressing.
Add cheese, Prosciutto, black olives, onion, peas, broccoli, carrots, bell pepper, mushrooms, asparagus tips and sliced basil.
Toss gently. Season to taste.
Fan avocado slices on top.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and tomato.
Serves 4.
explanation: The answer provided describes a recipe for an Avocado Pasta Salad, which is a cold dish. The user's question asks for a method to make a creamy avocado pasta, typically referring to a warm dish. question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. curly noodles
2 small avocados
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. butter or margarine
garlic salt and pepper to taste
Parmesan cheese to taste
Directions:
Cook noodles according to package directions.
Drain in colander and return to pot.
Add butter, grated cheeses, seasonings and thinly sliced avocados.
Stir.
Serves 4 to 6. Very quick and easy to make and your family will think you're a gourmet cook!
explanation: The provided answer discusses a recipe for an 'Avocado Pasta Salad', which is different from a 'creamy avocado pasta'. question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Avocado Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. mashed avocado
1/2 c. sour cream
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. grated onion
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. chili powder
3 slices bacon, crisp cooked
Directions:
Combine avocado, sour cream, lemon juice, onion, salt and chili powder. Chill. Stir in bacon, crumbled. Garnish with bacon curl.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Vegetable Mix Salad
Ingredients:

1 c. mayo or salad dressing

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?

Title: Creamy Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado, peeled and pitted
1 (8 oz.) container plain yogurt
2 Tbsp. minced onion

1/8 tsp. white pepper
carrot sticks
Directions:

Stir until blended.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skin removed or chicken cutlets (use mallet to tenderize)
2 lemons
1 tsp. thyme, garlic powder and marjoram
2 or more Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. honey (can add more if necessary)
Directions:
Mix ingredients; marinate chicken for one hour.
Put in broiler for 10 minutes or so.
explanation: The answer provides a tangy chicken marinade recipe with all necessary ingredients and basic directions, directly addressing the user's question about a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade. The inclusion of tangy flavor ingredients (lemons, thyme, garlic powder, marjoram, soy sauce, and honey) and the process (mix ingredients, marinate for one hour, broil for 10 minutes) aligns perfectly with the query.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Marinade With Tangy Dressing
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. oil
1 can each: corn, peas and green beans, drained
1 green pepper, chopped
1 (4 oz.) jar pimento, drained and diced
1 c. onion, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
Directions:
Heat together vinegar, salt, pepper, sugar and oil until sugar is dissolved.
Set aside to cool.
Place vegetables in large bowl and pour dressing over vegetable mixture.
Refrigerate overnight. Serves 6 to 8.
explanation: The provided answer is a recipe for a vegetable marinade with a tangy dressing. Although it includes tangy elements such as vinegar and sugar, it does not feature chicken as a main ingredient, nor does it specifically mention a marinade for chicken. question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. sesame oil
4 to 6 green onions, finely chopped
1 (1-inch) piece ginger root, peeled and minced
1/2 c. sugar
2 garlic cloves, finely chopped
Directions:
Combine soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, onions and ginger in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil to dissolve sugar and stir to blend flavors. Cool and pour over chicken.
Let stand at room temperature for 2 hours or refrigerate for 4 hours.
Bring chicken back to room temperature.
Place on grill and grill each side for 10 minutes.
Brown remaining sauce on chicken while on grill.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a tangy chicken, which aligns with the user's request for a tangy chicken marinade. Title: Marinade(Great For Chicken And Spareribs)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, blenderized
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Heat all to boiling.
Marinate meat and brush every 15 minutes while cooking.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?

Title: Herb-Marinated Chicken(Makes 6 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 to 2 1/2 lb. meaty chicken pieces
2 Tbsp. oil
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 c. white wine
2 tsp. dried basil

2 cloves garlic, minced

Marinate for 5 to 24 hours in refrigerator, turning bag occasionally.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 boiled eggs, peeled and halved
1/4 c. butter, softened
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 tsp. mustard
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Mix egg yolks and all other ingredients well.
Spoon into egg whites and chill.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
12 large eggs
1 tsp. plus 1 Tbsp. cider vinegar or distilled white vinegar
1/3 c. half and half
2 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place eggs in a pot with water to cover and 1 teaspoon vinegar.
Bring to boiling over medium heat.
Cover; remove from heat.
Let stand 20 minutes.
Drain eggs.
Cover with cold water. When cool, drain and peel.
Halve eggs lengthwise.
Remove yolks to small bowl.
Mash with fork.
Mix in 1 tablespoon vinegar, one third cup half and half, mustard, sugar, salt and pepper.
Spoon yolk mixture into egg white halves.
Refrigerate until serving.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for classic deviled eggs, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions. It addresses all aspects of the user's question by giving a thorough guide on how to prepare the dish, hence it is relevant.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
1 doz. boiled eggs
3/4 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. green relish
2 to 3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Boil eggs; cool and remove shells.
Cut in half.
Remove yolks to mixing bowl.
With fork, crumble yolks for easy mixing.
Add salt, pepper, sugar, green relish and mayonnaise and mix well.
Do not use too much mayonnaise or mixture will be runny.
Put 1/2 tablespoon of the yolk mixture back in egg white.
Garnish with paprika.
explanation: The answer provided is a fully relevant recipe for classic deviled eggs. It lists all the necessary ingredients and provides a step-by-step process that directly addresses the user's question. The instructions are clear, and the note on not using too much mayonnaise indicates an understanding of the desired consistency of the mixture.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
3 qt. cold water
1 doz. egg
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
1/2 lb. bacon
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
paprika
Directions:
In large pot, add water and gently add eggs.
Bring water to hard rapid boil.
Reduce to simmer for 10 minutes.
Put pot into sink and fill with cold water.
Let sit for 20 minutes. Meanwhile, cut bacon into 1/2-inch pieces and fry until crisp. Drain and set aside.
In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise, mustard, salt and pepper; set aside.
Peel eggs; cut in half lengthwise, separating the whites and yolks.
Rinse out whites.
Mash yolks into fine substance.
Add bacon and mix well.
Add to mayonnaise mixture and mix well.
Add more mayonnaise if desired.
Fill egg whites with mixture.
Sprinkle with paprika and serve.
Best served cold.
explanation: The answer provided is a complete recipe for classic deviled eggs, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions. It directly addresses the user's question by offering a detailed method to prepare the dish, making it highly relevant.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard-cooked eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. mustard or vinegar
3 Tbsp. salad dressing (enough to moisten)
Directions:
Cut egg in halves.
Slip out yolks.
Mash with fork.
Mix in remaining ingredients.
Refill white with yolk mixture.
explanation: The provided answer is relevant as it contains a complete recipe for classic deviled eggs, listing all necessary ingredients and providing step-by-step directions for preparation, which directly addresses the user's question.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?

Title: Spinach Squares
Ingredients:

2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
2 eggs
1/4 c. Romano cheese
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil

1 pkg. filo dough (1/2 for 9 x 13-inch pan)

Layer 1 sheet of filo; brush with oleo.

Ingredients:
1/2 lb. fresh spinach
1 clove minced garlic
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 stick butter
1 box fettucine
1/2 c. heavy cream
1 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:

Ingredients:

Ingredients:

3 Tbsp. onion, chopped

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Vegetables
Ingredients:
6 to 8 tiny new potatoes, quartered (1 to 1 1/2 lb.)
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
3/4 c. frozen peas
1 medium onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. water
1 tsp. curry powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. each: garlic and ginger powder
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook potatoes and onion in hot oil until the edges start to brown.
Add water, curry powder, salt, garlic, ginger and red pepper.
Bring to boiling; reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for about 10 to 15 minutes.
Add cauliflower; cook about 5 minutes more or until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.
Add frozen peas; heat through, adding a little more water if necessary.
Makes 4 to 6 side dish servings.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for a vegetable curry, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step instructions. It directly addresses the user's request for a quick recipe for a vegetable curry, making it a relevant response.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?

Title: Vegetable Curry
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower, cut up
6 tomatoes, cut and peeled
6 to 8 potatoes, small and cut up
1/4 lb. shelled peas
1/4 lb. green beans, sliced
1 Tbsp. turmeric
1 1/2 Tbsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. butter
6 small onions
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. stock
Directions:
Place vegetables on a large plate.
Sprinkle with mixed spices and salt.
Melt butter in a heavy pan.
Saute the onions and garlic.
Add the spiced veggies and stock.
Cover and bring to a boil, simmer for about 20 minutes until all vegetables are tender. Serve with hot cooked rice.
Enjoy!
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for a vegetable curry, including ingredients, proportions, and step-by-step cooking directions. question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Fish Curry(Serves 4 To 6)
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. water
1/3 c. dry white wine
1 lb. frozen fish fillets, cut in 1 1/2-inch cubes
1 1/2 Tbsp. corn oil
2 medium tomatoes, cut in 1/2-inch cubes (2 c.)
1 large zucchini, cut in 1/2-inch cubes (2 c.)
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced or pressed
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. curry powder
1/8 tsp. white pepper
hot, cooked rice (optional)
Directions:
Heat 1 1/2 cups water and wine in large skillet over medium heat.
Add fish; cover and simmer 3 to 4 minutes or until fish flakes easily.
Drain, reserving 1 1/2 cups liquid.
Heat corn oil over medium heat in large skillet.
Add tomatoes, zucchini, onion and garlic.
Cook 5 minutes or until crisp-tender, stirring occasionally.
Stir in reserved liquid.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
2/3 c. whole wheat or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. buttermilk
12 chicken wings
Directions:
In 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch roasting pan in 425° oven, melt butter.
Remove pan from oven.
On wax paper, mix next 5 ingredients.
Pour buttermilk into small bowl.
Dip one wing at a time in buttermilk, then in crumb mixture.
Place wings in melted butter in roasting pan, turning to coat evenly.
Bake 35 minutes or until chicken wings are tender.
explanation: The provided answer gives a method for oven-frying chicken wings, which involves some similar steps to oven-baking such as using butter and a baking process. However, it does not specifically address making the wings 'crispy', which is a key aspect of the question. question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Potato Pone
Ingredients:
6 to 8 large sweet potatoes
1 tbsp ground nutmeg
1 tbsp allspice
1 tsp vanilla
1 tsp lemon peel, grated
4 oz evaporated milk
1 1/2 cups granulated sugar
1 tbsp ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp black pepper
2 large eggs, beaten
1 1/2 sticks butter
4 oz olive oil
Directions:
Wash potatoes.
Remove spots.
Do not peel.
Grate potatoes. Add all other ingredients.
Heat oil and butter;
add potato mixture. Make sure it does not stick.
The pone will be finished when it turns almost brown in color.
Transfer to two 9 inch pie pans.
Let cool.
Slice.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?

Title: Poached Trout
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. dressed trout or smaller
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. water
4 slices lemon
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. salt
1 sprig parsley

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Poached Eggs
Ingredients:
4 eggs
4 slices toast
butter or magarine
1 1/2 c. milk (approximately)
salt
pepper
Directions:
Heat milk slowly in a large skillet.
Add salt, pepper and 1 tablespoon butter.
Add eggs when milk is steaming (don't break yolks).
Spoon milk over eggs.
About now, put toast in toaster. Turn eggs, if necessary.
Stir milk, it will start to look like gravy.
Butter toast in plate.
Place 1 egg on each piece of toast.
Spoon gravy over top.
Add salt and pepper to taste!
explanation: The answer provides a clear and detailed recipe for making poached eggs, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make a perfect poached egg. Set aside.
Cook onion slightly in margarine.
Add potatoes with pimento, cheese, bread cubes, onion and seasonings. Do not melt cheese completely, you want them chunky.

I use a 9 x 13-inch glass pan.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?

Title: Poached Fish
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water or skim milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 bay leaf
a few cloves or peppercorns
1 lb. fish fillets or steaks of your choice
Directions:
Stir together water, lemon juice, onion and seasonings in a large skillet.
Bring to a simmer.
Add fish; cover and adjust heat to maintain a simmer.
Cook 10 minutes per inch of thickness of thickest part of fish, probably 5 to 10 minutes.
Fish is done when it is opaque and flakes easily with a fork.
Don't overcook or it becomes tough and dry.
Serve hot with sauce or lemon juice or cold in chunks in salad.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beaters.
Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe titled 'Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms' that includes all the necessary ingredients and steps to make a creamy mushroom pasta. It specifies the ingredients such as fettuccine, evaporated skim milk, fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing, minced garlic, egg beaters, sliced mushrooms, and fat-free Parmesan cheese. question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:

1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Broccoli, Cauliflower And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 small head trimmed cauliflower, cut in florets
1 small bunch broccoli, trimmed and cut in florets
2 tsp. olive oil or vegetable oil
3 cloves garlic
2 1/2 thickly sliced mushrooms
2 1/2 c. whole noodles
1 c. low-fat small curd cottage cheese
1/2 c. low-fat milk
1/4 c. low-fat sour cream
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
In a large pot of boiling water, cook cauliflower and broccoli until tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
With a slotted spoon, remove vegetables and save the liquid for cooking the pasta.
In a large skillet, heat oil.
Saute garlic for 2 minutes over medium heat. Add mushrooms for about 5 minutes.
Stir in broccoli and cauliflower.
Saute for 2 to 3 minutes longer; set aside. Meanwhile in reserved boiling vegetable liquid, cook pasta.
Add water if necessary tender but until firm, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain.
In a food processor combine cottage cheese, milk, sour cream and Parmesan.
Pour over broccoli mixture, add drained pasta and toss until mixed.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.
Make 8 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a 'Creamy Pasta With Broccoli, Cauliflower And Mushrooms' which includes mushrooms and a creamy sauce. This is somewhat relevant to the user's request for a creamy mushroom pasta. However, the recipe does not specifically mention making the dish creamy, nor does it fully encapsulate a standard 'creamy mushroom pasta' recipe, which might typically include ingredients like heavy cream or a roux. The recipe also includes additional vegetables (broccoli and cauliflower) and a specific process that may not align with the simplicity of the user's question.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. mushrooms (white)
1 can Carnation milk
1 stick butter
1/2 c. flour
pinch of garlic powder
salt and white pepper
Directions:
Wash and slice mushrooms; set aside.
Melt butter over low heat, then add mushrooms, sauteing them until they are slightly brown.
Add flour; stir as you add, then slowly pour in canned milk.
Stir until you get the consistency you like.
Add garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Makes a great sauce over veggies, pasta, chicken or fish.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a creamy mushroom sauce, which is related to making a creamy mushroom pasta. question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. butter
3 to 4 Tbsp. ice water
1/3 c. finely chopped onion
1/8 tsp. white pepper
6 slices bacon, fried crisply and crumbled
1/4 lb. Swiss cheese, diced
4 eggs, beaten
2 c. light cream
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Combine flour and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Cut in 1/3 cup butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Gradually stir in ice water until mixture forms a ball.
Roll dough out on lightly floured board to fit 10-inch pie plate. Transfer to plate and shape edges.
Saute onion in 1 tablespoon butter until tender.
Set aside to cool.
Line crust with bacon and cheese.
Combine eggs, cream, remaining salt and spices and sauteed onion.
Pour into crust.
Bake at 375° about 35 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Serve hot!
explanation: The answer provided directly addresses the question about making a classic quiche Lorraine by listing all the necessary ingredients and giving a step-by-step recipe. It includes crucial elements such as flour, butter, onion, bacon, cheese, eggs, cream, and spices, along with detailed instructions that cover the process from preparing the dough to baking the quiche.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 lb. bacon
1 c. grated Swiss cheese
5 eggs
2 c. sour cream
2 Tbsp. (1/2 pkg.) dry onion soup mix
1/4 c. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper, nutmeg and cayenne
Directions:
Cut bacon into small pieces.
Fry and drain.
Sprinkle over bottom of unbaked 10-inch pie shell.
Add cheese.
Beat eggs until foamy.
Add sour cream, parsley, onion soup and spices.
Beat. Pour into pie shell.
Bake at 375° for 45 minutes or until knife comes out clean.
Cool on wire rack about 10 minutes before serving.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed list of ingredients and step-by-step directions specific to creating a classic quiche Lorraine. It directly addresses the user's question about making this dish, making it highly relevant and useful.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. butter
2 Tbsp. ice water
3 eggs
1 1/4 c. whipping cream
1 tsp. mixed herbs
dash of black pepper
dash of salt
1 c. diced smoked ham
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar or Jarlsberg cheese
dash of paprika
Directions:
Measure flour into a bowl.
Cut in butter with a pastry blender until coarse crumbs form.
Add ice water, mixing with a fork until dough forms a ball.
Wrap.
Chill for 1 hour.
Roll dough out to fit bottom and sides of a 9-inch quiche pan.
Prick dough with a fork.
Bake pie shell at 425° for about 10 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a quiche, but it does not specify that it is a 'classic quiche Lorraine'. question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. bacon
1 unbaked 9-inch pie shell
3 eggs
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
1/4 tsp. salt
pinch of pepper
pinch of nutmeg
1/4 c. grated Swiss cheese
Directions:
Cut bacon in 1-inch pieces; cook until crisp.
Drain on absorbent paper.
Spread on bottom of pie shell.
Beat eggs, cream and seasonings just enough to blend.
Stir in cheese; pour into pie shell.
Bake at 375° for about 35 minutes or until pie shell is golden brown and filling is firm.
Serves 4 as an entree, 8 to 12 as an appetizer.
explanation: The answer provided is directly related to the question about making a classic quiche Lorraine. It lists the ingredients and gives step-by-step directions, which are essential for preparing the dish. All the key components required for making a quiche Lorraine are present, including the main ingredients and the baking instructions.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
2 c. shredded Swiss cheese
8 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
1 tsp. chopped chives
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 unbaked 9-inch pie shell
nutmeg
Directions:
Beat eggs in bowl.
Add milk, cheese, bacon, chives, salt and pepper.
Pour into pie shell.
Sprinkle with nutmeg.
Bake at 400° for 30 to 35 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Yields 6 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for a quiche Lorraine, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make this classic dish. It includes all necessary ingredients and steps, making it a fully relevant response.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola Bars
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. rolled oats
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. raw sunflower seeds
1/4 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. slivered almonds
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. dark brown sugar
1/2 c. honey
1 c. raisins
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Heat oven to 300°.
Spread oats, coconut, sunflower seeds, sesame seed, wheat germ and almonds on a 9 x 12-inch baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed list of ingredients and a step-by-step baking process specifically for making homemade granola bars, which directly addresses the user's question. It includes the main components typically found in granola bars and outlines the preparation method, making it a relevant response.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Granola Bars
Ingredients:
4 c. raw oats (Quaker)
1 c. chopped nuts (like almonds, walnuts or sunflower)
1 c. seedless raisins or 1/2 c. mini chocolate chips
1/4 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. dry milk powder
1 c. light corn syrup
2/3 c. salad oil
1 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Lightly grease 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch jelly roll pan.
In large bowl, mix all ingredients thoroughly.
Spoon mixture into prepared pan.
With oiled fingers, press out firmly and evenly into pan. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden.
Cool at least 2 hours before cutting or they will fall apart.
Makes 32 bars at 195 calories each.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for making homemade granola bars, listing all the necessary ingredients and giving step-by-step instructions, which directly addresses the user's question. It also includes nutritional information (calories per bar), which might be of interest to someone looking to make a healthy snack.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
4 c. uncooked oatmeal (quick type)
1 c. chopped peanuts (no skins)
1/2 c. Grape-Nuts
1/2 c. bran (unprocessed, uncooked)
sugar substitute to equal 1/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Spread the oatmeal on a cookie sheet and heat in a 350° oven for 10 minutes.
Combine all but the last two ingredients.
Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet or pan for 20 minutes, stirring once to brown evenly.
Allow mixture to cook in the oven.
Add wheat germ and raisins.
Refrigerate in glass jars or plastic containers.
(Granulated sugar substitute was more acceptable than liquid sugar substitute in this product.)
explanation: The answer provides a list of ingredients and gives a brief outline of the process for making granola, which is part of making granola bars. question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Granola Bars
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. honey
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
4 1/2 c. granola type cereal
2/3 c. chopped nuts or coconut
Directions:
In a 3-quart pan, melt butter, then add brown sugar, honey, vanilla and salt; stir until well blended.
Stir in granola and desired nuts and coconut.
Turn into a well-greased 10 x 15-inch pan.
Press in firmly to form an even layer.
Bake, uncovered, in a 400° oven until browned and bubbly, about 10 to 15 minutes.
Cool slightly and cut into bars while still warm.
Yields 32 bars.
explanation: The answer provides clear, step-by-step instructions for making homemade granola bars, including the ingredients and the baking process. It directly addresses the user's question, thus making it highly relevant.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Leg Of Lamb Mosaic
Ingredients:
1 (5 lb.) leg of lamb, boned and butterflied (with fell)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, minced or 1 tsp. dried, crumbled
2 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 lb. fresh spinach leaves, stemmed
4 medium carrots, cooked
4 whole pimientos, drained
1/2 medium onion, thinly sliced
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 medium celery stalks, chopped
2 medium carrots, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 c. dry vermouth
1 c. chicken stock
Directions:
Position rack in center of oven and preheat to 325°.
Pat meat dry.
Place on surface, fell side down with long edge toward you. Sprinkle with rosemary and garlic.
Cover with layer of spinach leaves.
Arrange 4 carrots in 2 rows across center of meat. Surround carrots with pimientos.
Scatter onion slices atop carrots.
Sprinkle with parsley, 2 teaspoons salt, 3/4 teaspoon pepper and cayenne.
Starting at short end, roll meat up tightly. Tie securely with kitchen twine at 2-inch intervals.
Place on rack in roasting pan.
Add celery, 2 chopped carrots and onion to pan.
Pour vermouth over meat.
Season with salt and pepper. Roast until thermometer inserted in thickest part of meat registers 130° (for medium rare), about 1 1/2 hours, adding up to 1/2 cup water to pan if necessary to keep vegetables from sticking.
Transfer meat to cutting board; let stand 15 minutes.
explanation: The provided answer is a recipe for Leg Of Lamb Mosaic, which includes ground lamb as part of its ingredients. However, the recipe does not utilize eggplant, which was mentioned in the user's question. While the ground lamb is relevant, the absence of eggplant in the recipe makes the answer only partially relevant to the original query. The user might find the recipe useful, but it doesn't directly answer the request for a dish combining eggplant with ground lamb.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Moussaka
Ingredients:
2 (1 lb.) eggplants, peeled and cut into 1/4 to 1/2-inch thick slices
1/4 c. cooking oil
2 lb. ground lamb or beef
1 c. chopped onion (large)
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
3/4 c. dry red wine
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried oregano, crushed
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 beaten egg
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 c. milk
3 eggs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
ground cinnamon
snipped fresh parsley (optional)
Directions:
Brush both sides of eggplant slices with the oil. In a large skillet, brown eggplant slices over medium heat about 2 minutes per side. Drain; set aside.
explanation: The answer provided is a recipe for Moussaka, which includes both eggplant and ground lamb as key ingredients. The recipe instructions directly address the user's question about what can be made with eggplant and ground lamb. It provides a relevant and practical solution that uses both specified ingredients.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Easy Moussaka
Ingredients:
3 medium size eggplants
1 c. butter or margarine
3 large onions
2 lb. ground lamb (true Moussaka) or beef
3 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. dry red wine
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
salt to taste
freshly ground pepper to taste
6 Tbsp. flour
1 qt. milk
4 eggs, beaten until frothy
nutmeg to taste
2 c. Ricotta cheese
1 c. packaged fine bread crumbs
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplants; slice 1/2-inch thick.
Brown slices quickly in large, heavy skillet in 4 tablespoons butter (more as needed). Set aside.
Heat 4 tablespoons butter in same skillet.
Cook onions until lightly browned.
Add ground meat; cook for 10 minutes.
Combine tomato paste with wine, parsley, cinnamon, salt and pepper; stir into meat.
Simmer, stirring frequently, until all liquid has been absorbed.
Remove from heat.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Spiceland Hen House Eggplant(In Honor Of Stallion, "Nat'S Luck")
Ingredients:
3 large eggplant
water (for cooking)
1/2 lb. bulk Italian mild sausage
3 green onions, chopped
1 c. red onions, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
1 (6 1/4 oz.) pkg. cornbread stuffing mix
1/2 tsp. black pepper flakes
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Peel and dice eggplant; cook in salted water until tender. Drain well and set aside.
(It is really best to steam, rather than to boil the eggplant.) Saute green onions, red onions and celery in a skillet with small amount of cooking oil until transparent; set aside.
Saute sausage, in skillet, until well done; remove to paper towels; set aside.
Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions; set aside.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Garden Rice
Ingredients:
1 bunch green onions, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 lb. zucchini and/or yellow squash, sliced
1 (12 oz.) Mexican corn
3/4 c. butter*
1 tsp. lemon pepper
1/2 tsp. cilantro (dry)
3/4 tsp. oregano (dry)
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chopped parsley (dry)
1 1/2 c. raw rice (white)
Directions:
Saute green onions, green pepper and squash in 4 tablespoons butter until tender. Add corn, seasonings and parsley. Set aside. Cook rice. Place rice in large bowl. Pour 1/2-cup melted butter over cooked rice and toss lightly. Add seasoned vegetables, tossing again. Place in a buttered casserole dish (13 x 9 x 2). Cover. Heat in 350° oven for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Rice Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. garlic, chopped
2 medium onions, sliced
4 c. V-8 juice (low sodium)
4 c. water
8 vegetable bouillon cubes (small cubes that make 1 c. each)
2 c. each: frozen green beans, peas, corn and carrots
1 c. brown rice, cooked according to pkg. directions
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can white kidney beans
Directions:
In an 8-quart saucepan, heat oil, garlic and onions over medium high heat.
Saute 5 to 6 minutes or until onions are clear. Add V-8 juice, water, bouillon cubes and vegetables.
Heat until soup comes to a boil.
Add rice and kidney beans.
Allow to heat through.
Remove from heat and serve.
Makes 10 to 12 servings.
