question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Beef
Ingredients:
2 small boxes frozen broccoli
2 lb. ground beef
2 c. (8 oz.) tomatoes
1 medium bell pepper
1/2 medium onion
1/2 c. catsup (ketchup)
1/2 c. French salad dressing
salt and pepper as desired
grated sharp or medium sharp Cheddar cheese or low-fat cheese of choice
Directions:
Grate Cheddar cheese.
Cut up and dice onion and bell pepper. In a large skillet, cook ground beef, onion, pepper and thawed broccoli together until beef is brown and broccoli is cooked, yet still crisp.
Drain off any excess fat.
Put back in skillet and add the remaining ingredients.
Bring to boil; afterwards lower heat to a good simmer.
Simmer for 10 full minutes (or until thickened somewhat).
Serve over cooked rice or pasta.
(You may substitute low-fat ground turkey for a low-fat family meal, if desired.)
Top with grated cheese on individual servings. Delicious!

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Beef Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 1/4 c. milk
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 beaten egg
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, cooked and well-drained
2 crust (9-inch) pie
4 oz. Mozzarella cheese, sliced
milk
Directions:
Brown beef and onion.
Drain off fat.
Stir in flour, salt and garlic.
Add milk and softened cream cheese.
Cook and stir until bubbly.
Add moderate amount of hot mixture to beaten egg. Return to mixture in skillet.
Cook until thickened, 1 to 2 minutes.
Stir in broccoli.
Set aside.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for Broccoli-Beef Pie, which indeed involves ground beef and broccoli. However, it does not directly address the question of what one can cook with these two ingredients in a simpler or more straightforward way. question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef-Broccoli Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, chopped, cooked and drained
4 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
1/4 c. chopped onion
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. milk
1 egg, beaten
2 recipes plain pastry
milk
Directions:
In a skillet, brown beef and onion; drain off fat.
Stir in flour, salt and garlic salt.
Add 1 1/4 cups of milk and the softened cream cheese.
Cook and stir until smooth and bubbly. Stir about 1 cup of the hot mixture into the beaten egg; return to mixture skillet.
Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture is thickened, 1/2 minute.
Stir in cooked, chopped broccoli; set aside.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef And Broccoli
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. beef tenderloin
1/2 c. beef stock
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. dry sherry
4 Tbsp. olive oil
1 lb. broccoli florets
pinch of red pepper flakes
salt
Directions:
Cut beef into strips 1-inch long, 1/4-inch thick and 1/2-inch wide; set aside.
In a small cup, stir together stock, cornstarch, soy sauce and sherry; set aside.
In a heavy skillet, heat 2 tablespoons oil until very hot.
Add broccoli, then toss and stir for 2 minutes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes more over medium heat; remove to side dish.
Return skillet to high heat and add remaining 2 tablespoons oil and heat until smoking hot.
Add beef and cook 2 minutes.
Stir in stock mixture and add along with broccoli.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for Beef and Broccoli, which directly relates to the question of cooking with ground beef and broccoli. However, the recipe uses beef tenderloin instead of ground beef. While the ingredients and base cooking method align with the question, the specific type of beef used is different. Thus, while it partially addresses the question, it does not fully meet the user's request for a ground beef recipe.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef Broccoli Supper
Ingredients:
3/4 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 lb. ground beef
1 1/2 c. fresh broccoli florets
1 can (10.75 oz) condensed broccoli cheese soup, undiluted
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt-free seasoning blend
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Cook rice according to package directions.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain.
Add the rice, broccoli, soup, milk, seasoning blend, salt and pepper; stir until combined.
Transfer to a greased 2-quart baking dish.
Toss bread crumbs and butter; sprinkle over beef mixture.
Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Uncover; bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until heated through.
Serves 4 to 6.
explanation: The answer provided is a recipe titled 'Beef Broccoli Supper' which directly addresses the user's question about cooking with ground beef and broccoli. It includes a list of ingredients and steps that clearly outline how to prepare this dish using the specified ingredients, thus it fully addresses the question with correct and useful information.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Grilled Steak With Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh shallots
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh chives
1 tsp. chopped fresh tarragon
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. softened butter
4 beef porterhouse or T-Bone steaks
Directions:
In 1-quart saucepan, stir all ingredients except butter and steaks.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until all liquid has evaporated (5 to 6 minutes).
Set aside and cool completely.
In small bowl, stir together butter and cooked, cooled herbs.
Place mixture on waxed paper; shape into 4-inch log.
Refrigerate until serving.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for making herb butter, which is a component of garlic herb butter for steak. However, it does not include the specific ingredients or instructions for incorporating garlic into the butter, which is a key aspect of the original question. Ingredients:
1 round steak
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. ketchup
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaves

Directions:

Directions:
On halibut steaks, arrange on greased baking pan, which can be used for serving.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herb-Butter Sauce For Grilled Steak
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or margarine
2 tsp. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/3 c. chopped parsley
1 tsp. dried tarragon
dash of Tabasco sauce
Directions:
Put butter/margarine in small bowl and allow to come to room temperature until soft.
Beat with a wooden spoon until light and fluffy.
Add lemon juice, pepper, parsley, tarragon and Tabasco. Thoroughly blend.
Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 1/2 lb. fresh broccoli
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped
Directions:
Wash and trim broccoli; cut stalks into spears.
Cook broccoli, covered in a small amount of boiling unsalted water about 10 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Drain.
explanation: The answer provides a list of ingredients and a brief cooking method for a cheesy broccoli casserole. However, it lacks detailed instructions on how to combine these ingredients into a casserole and bake it. question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Cheddar Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
6 slices white or wheat bread
1 medium to large bunch broccoli
3 eggs
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. melted butter
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Butter an 8-inch square glass baking dish.
Cover bottom of dish generously with torn bite-size pieces of bread.
Cut broccoli into bite-size pieces and lay on top of bread pieces.
Mix together all remaining ingredients.
Pour over broccoli and bread. Cover dish with foil or glass cover and bake in a preheated 350° oven for 35 minutes.
explanation: The provided answer gives a complete recipe for a Broccoli-Cheddar Cheese Casserole, which includes both the ingredients and the steps to make a cheesy broccoli dish. The question asked for a method to prepare a cheesy broccoli casserole, and the answer directly addresses this request with a suitable recipe, making it relevant.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. broccoli (can use fresh)
1 chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1 (3 oz.) cream cheese
1 c. milk
3/4 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook broccoli and onion together for 5 minutes.
In saucepan, melt butter or margarine and mix in flour, salt, pepper and milk. Cook and stir until bubbly.
Blend in cream cheese until smooth. Place broccoli and onion mix in 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
Pour cream cheese mixture on top of broccoli.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 30 to 35 minutes. (This is my favorite of all broccoli casseroles.)
explanation: The answer directly addresses the user's question by providing a title, a list of ingredients, and step-by-step instructions for making a cheesy broccoli casserole, which is exactly what the user is seeking.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 boxes frozen chopped broccoli, cooked and drained
1/4 lb. Velveeta cheese, cut into chunks
1 stick butter, melted
1 stack Ritz crackers, crushed
Directions:
Spray 8-inch square baking dish.
Place broccoli in dish. Cook cheese and half of butter in saucepan until cheese melts, stirring constantly.
Pour over broccoli.
Toss crackers with remaining butter in bowl; sprinkle over cheese.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Yield: 4 servings.
explanation: The answer directly provides a recipe for a cheesy broccoli casserole, including a list of ingredients and detailed cooking instructions, which addresses the user's question about how to make this dish. It provides the necessary components and steps to successfully create the casserole, making it highly relevant to the inquiry.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1 c. sour cream
1 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Bisquick
1/4 c. margarine
2 eggs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Grease lightly a square baking dish, 8 x 8 x 2-inches.
Spread broccoli in dish. Beat sour cream, cottage cheese, Bisquick, margarine and eggs well with hand beater 1 minute.
Pour over broccoli.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.
explanation: The answer provided is a complete and detailed recipe for a cheesy broccoli casserole, directly addressing the user's question. It lists all the necessary ingredients and gives step-by-step directions for preparation and baking, indicating how to achieve the desired dish.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grilled Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
1/3 c. balsamic vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 shallots, finely chopped
1 tsp. dried Italian seasoning
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. molasses
1/2 lb. carrots, scraped
1 sweet red pepper
1 sweet yellow pepper
2 zucchini
2 yellow squash
1 large onion
Directions:
Combine first 7 ingredients in a large bowl.
Set aside.
Cut remaining vegetables into large pieces and add to vinegar mixture, tossing to coat.
Let stand 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain, reserving vinegar mixture.
Arrange in a grill basket. Cook, covered with grill lid, over medium-hot coals (350° to 400°) for 15 to 20 minutes, turning occasionally.
Return vegetables to reserved vinegar mixture, tossing gently.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Makes 6 cups.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a grilled vegetable salad, which is relevant to the user's question about making a classic grilled vegetable salad. However, it lacks information on the traditional components of a classic salad, such as dressing details, the use of fresh herbs, or how to assemble the salad. It also doesn't mention whether it includes any specific cheese, nuts, or other additions typically found in a classic grilled vegetable salad. Therefore, while the primary context of grilling vegetables is addressed, key aspects of making a 'classic' version are not fully covered, making the answer only partially relevant.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grill-Side Garden Salad
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes, seeded and chopped (about 2 c.)
1 medium zucchini, diced (about 1 c.)
1 c. frozen whole kernel corn, thawed *
1/3 c. thinly sliced green onions with tops
1 small ripe avocado, peeled, seeded and coarsely chopped
1/3 c. Pace picante sauce
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro or parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon or lime juice
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
Combine tomatoes, zucchini, corn, green onions and avocado in large bowl.
Combine remaining ingredients; mix well.
Pour over vegetable mixture and mix gently.
Chill 3 to 4 hours, occasionally stirring gently.
Stir gently and serve chilled or at room temperature with additional picante sauce.
Makes 4 to 6 servings, about 4 cups salad.
explanation: The answer provided is for a Grill-Side Garden Salad which includes grilling as part of its preparation. Although it mentions vegetables and a method that involves grilling, it does not specifically guide the user on how to make a 'classic' grilled vegetable salad. question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Potato Salad
Ingredients:
6 medium red potatoes
3 Tbsp. Crisco oil
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 tsp. freeze dried chives
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/3 c. chopped celery
1/3 c. chopped onion
2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 tsp. prepared mustard
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Cool slightly.
Peel and slice potatoes.
Place in medium serving bowl.
Combine Crisco oil, vinegar, chives, sugar, salt and pepper in small bowl.
Stir until blended.
Pour over potatoes.
Cover.
Refrigerate about 2 hours.
Add celery, onion, eggs and parsley.
Mix well.
Combine mayonnaise and mustard in small bowl.
Stir into potato mixture. Cover.
Refrigerate at least 2 hours.
explanation: The provided answer is for a 'Classic Potato Salad' recipe, which does not address the user's question about making a 'classic grilled vegetable salad.' The ingredients, preparation, and cooking method are specific to potatoes and include condiments and proteins not typically found in a grilled vegetable salad.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?

Title: Peppers Stuffed With Sausage
Ingredients:
6 bell peppers
1/2 lb. sausage meat
2 c. cooked rice
1 tsp. salt
1 c. tomatoes
1/2 c. boiling water
Directions:
Wash peppers and remove seeds.
Boil for 5 minutes in water to cover.
Remove from water and fill with the meat, rice, salt and strained tomatoes which have been mixed together.
Place in baking dish, add the boiling water and bake at 400° for 1 hour.
Yields 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Summer Sausage
Ingredients:
5 lb. lean ground meat
5 tsp. Tender Quick salt
6 tsp. hickory smoke salt
2 1/2 tsp. mustard seed
2 1/2 tsp. minced garlic
2 1/2 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
whole black peppers (optional)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except whole black peppers. (Do not use metal bowl!) Refrigerate 24 hours, then mix again. Shape into 5 loaves. Add black whole peppers at this time. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet (one that has sides) at 300° for 15 minutes, then at 150° for 8 hours, turning loaves after 4 hours.
explanation: The provided answer details a recipe for making summer sausage, which does not incorporate bell peppers as specified in the question. question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?

Title: Italian Sausage With Green Peppers And Onions
Ingredients:
2 lb. Italian sausage, cut into 2-inch pieces
4 large bell peppers, cut in 2-inch squares
4 medium onions, cut in fourths
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar

1/8 tsp. oregano

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Baked Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1 1/4 lb. flounder
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. grated onion
1 (3 oz.) can mushrooms (undrained)
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. light cream
Directions:
In a shallow greased baking dish, arrange the fillets in one layer.
Sprinkle with lemon juice.
In a small saucepan, melt the butter over low heat; stir in flour, onion, salt and paprika.
Add cream and mushrooms, including liquid, in pan.
Cook, stirring constantly, until thick.
Pour over fillets; sprinkle with cheese. Bake in a preheated oven for 25 minutes at 350°.
Makes 4 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for baked fish fillets, which involves cooking fish. However, it does not specifically address how to achieve a crispy texture, which is a key component of the original question. question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?

Title: Easy Baked Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. whitefish fillets
1 Tbsp. lime juice
1 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1/8 tsp. onion powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°. Place fish in a greased 11 x 7-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, combine lime juice, mayonnaise, onion powder and pepper. Spread over fish. Sprinkle with bread crumbs; drizzle with butter. Bake about 20 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: White Fish Fillet
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine

pinch of nutmeg
white pepper to taste
1 1/2 oz. dry white wine

parsley
1 lb. loaf honey wheat bread dough (frozen)
2 large sliced Maui onions
4 cloves chopped garlic
1/4 c. butter
1 lb. cubed, cooked ham
1 c. fresh Parmesan cheese
3 to 4 Tbsp. fresh Parmesan to top
2 c. fresh basil, chopped
1/4 c. fresh parsley, chopped
2 to 3 Tbsp. Italian seasoning
1 Tbsp. Italian seasoning to top
1 c. black olives, sliced and halved
olive oil to seal ends and rub top of loaf with
pinch of salt to top
Directions:
Defrost bread dough.
Melt butter.
Add onions and garlic. Saute until transparent over medium heat.
Add ham; saute 2 to 3 minutes.
Take off stove; cool 5 minutes.
Add Parmesan, seasonings and olives.
Mix.
Let chill until ready to use.
Can be prepared 24 hours in advance.
Roll dough out on floured board to 1/8-inch, approximately 16 x 12-inch.
Place filling on dough. Spread evenly.
Roll jelly roll style.
Pinch and seal ends with olive oil.
Rub oil over top and sides of loaf.
Salt lightly. Sprinkle with reserved Parmesan and Italian seasoning.
Place in greased large baking pan.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until sounds hollow and top is brown.
Let sit 10 to 15 minutes; slice.
explanation: The provided answer is a recipe for making a loaf of honey wheat bread with toppings, which does not address the user's request for making crispy fish fillets. The ingredients and directions do not pertain to cooking fish and therefore do not provide useful information for the query.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Sausage Scramble(Serves 10 To 12)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. sausage
18 eggs
2 c. milk
2 c. croutons (garlic or onion)
3 c. grated cheese (sharp)
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Brown sausage and drain well.
Put into 9 x 13-inch pan.
Beat eggs, milk and cheese.
Pour 1/2 of mixture over sausage.
Spread with croutons.
Pour remainder of egg mixture over croutons.
Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes (until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Can be cut in half for smaller group.).
Can be made evening before and covered with foil.
(Do not bake.)
Refrigerate and it is ready to pop in the oven an hour before you plan to eat.
explanation: The provided answer is about making a sausage scramble, not fluffy scrambled eggs. The ingredients and steps do not pertain to the original question about achieving fluffiness in scrambled eggs. The recipe includes sausage, croutons, and specific baking instructions, which are not typical components or methods for making fluffy scrambled eggs.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Scrambled Eggs
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. butter
salt and pepper
Directions:
Crack eggs in a small bowl.
Mix with a fork.
Melt butter in a frying pan over low heat.
Pour in eggs.
Stir evenly until cooked.
Shake a little salt and pepper to taste.
Careful, not too much!
explanation: The answer provides a basic recipe for making scrambled eggs, which is somewhat relevant to the question about making fluffy scrambled eggs. However, it lacks specific tips or techniques that could make the eggs fluffier, such as whisking the eggs vigorously, adding a splash of milk, or cooking on low heat while constantly stirring.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Breakfast Eggs
Ingredients:
1 doz. eggs
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. butter
1 (8 oz.) container sour cream
12 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a medium bowl, beat eggs.
Stir in milk, salt and pepper; set aside.
In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter; pour in egg mixture.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until eggs are set but still moist.
Remove from heat to cool.
Stir in sour cream. Spread evenly into buttered 2-quart shallow baking dish (12 x 7-inch).
Top with bacon and cheese.
Cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.
Preheat oven to 300°.
Uncover eggs; bake 15 to 20 minutes or until hot and cheese has melted.
Refrigerate leftovers.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.
explanation: The provided answer outlines a method for preparing make-ahead breakfast eggs with sour cream, bacon, and cheese, but it does not address the specific request for making fluffy scrambled eggs. The instructions involve baking the mixture, which is not the same as cooking scrambled eggs on the stove.

Add eggs.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:

Ingredients:

2 tsp. baking powder
3/4 c. milk
2 c. fruit
1 c. flour
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. salt
1 stick butter
Directions:
Make batter of 1 cup sugar, flour, milk, baking powder and salt.
Melt butter in baking pan.
Pour batter in butter; add fruit.
Mix rest of sugar, water and pinch of salt together and pour over batter and fruit.
Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Cobbler(Peach, Strawberry, Apple Or Blackberry)
Ingredients:
1 qt. peaches (or other fruit)
1 1/2 c. sugar
3/4 c. milk
3/4 c. flour
1/2 stick butter
dash of salt
Directions:
Cut peaches, place in pot with 1/2 cup sugar and bring to boil.
Mix 1/2 cup sugar, 3/4 cup flour, salt and milk.
Spray Pyrex with Pam.
Dip peaches in bowl.
Spoon flour mixture over peaches.
Dot with butter, sprinkle 1/2 cup sugar over top of butter.
Bake in oven at 400° for 15 to 20 minutes or until done.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Fresh Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. almond or vanilla
3/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 stick melted butter
1/2 c. white sugar
2 c. sliced peaches
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Mix the brown sugar, flavoring, 1/2 cup white sugar and sliced peaches together; set aside.
Make batter of the flour, 1/2 cup sugar, baking powder, salt, melted butter and milk.
Pour batter into baking dish.
Cover with peach mixture.
Bake for 45 minutes at 375°.
If it browns too fast, reduce heat to 325°.
Serve warm with ice cream.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for making peach cobbler from scratch, including specific ingredients, measurements, and step-by-step directions. It directly addresses the user's question about how to prepare the dessert, making it a relevant response.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:

Ingredients:
1 stick butter
1 c. sugar
1 c. flour, sifted
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
3/4 c. milk
1 can fruit (any kind)
3/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Melt butter in 9 x 12 x 2-inch baking pan.
Stir 1 cup sugar, flour, baking powder and milk.
Mix and pour over butter melted in pan.
Mix fruit and 3/4 cup sugar.
Spoon over batter.
Bake at 350° until brown, about 45 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that includes peaches and involves making a cobbler. question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
5 c. fresh peaches, peeled and sliced
1 c. plus 1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 c. flour, divided
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/4 c. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
Place peaches, 1 cup sugar and nutmeg in a saucepan.
Stir over low heat until peaches begin to exude their juices.
Sprinkle on 1/4 cup flour; cook and stir until well incorporated.
Stir in the butter.
Turn into an ovenproof 9-inch baking dish.
Place remaining flour and salt in a small bowl.
Using a pastry blender (or fingertips), work in the shortening until the mixture resembles coarse meal.
Stir in enough water to make a soft dough. Gather the dough into a ball; roll out on a floured board.
Place rolled out dough over the peaches, tucking under the edges or trimming as needed.
Sprinkle the dough with 1 teaspoon sugar; slash in several places to allow the steam to escape.
Bake in preheated 400° oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until top is well browned.
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making a peach cobbler from scratch, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step instructions. It accurately addresses the user's question by giving the necessary information to prepare the dish as requested.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe (Lentil-Spinach Stew) that uses both lentils and spinach as required ingredients, addressing the user's question about what they can cook with these two items. It includes measurements, ingredients, and cooking instructions, making it a useful and directly relevant response.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, sliced
1 clove garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 c. water or chicken stock
8 oz. dried lentils
1 tsp. salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil over medium heat until onions are tender. Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice. Simmer about 5 more minutes. Serves 4.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe, titled 'Lentil Soup With Spinach', which uses both lentils and spinach as key ingredients, directly responding to the user's query about cooking with these ingredients.

Cover and simmer 1 hour.

answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 Tbsp. molasses
2/3 c. orange juice
2 c. canned or cooked mashed pumpkin
3 1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. ground cloves
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Beat butter at medium speed of mixer.
Gradually add sugar; beat well.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add molasses, orange juice and pumpkin.
Combine flour and next 5 ingredients.
Add to creamed mixture; mix until blended.
Stir in vanilla, raisins and nuts.
explanation: The provided answer is a complete recipe for spiced pumpkin bread, including all the necessary ingredients and step-by-step directions for making the bread. It directly addresses the user's question for a good recipe for spiced pumpkin bread, making it relevant.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
2/3 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. molasses
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 to 1 tsp. ground cloves
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In
mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add the pumpkin, orange juice, molasses and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients. Add to the creamed mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into two greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3 loaf pans. Bake at 350° for 65 to 75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pans onto wire racks.
explanation: The answer provided is a full recipe for spiced pumpkin bread, which directly addresses the user's question about a good recipe for spiced pumpkin bread. It includes all necessary ingredients, measurements, and a step-by-step process for preparation and baking, making it highly relevant and useful.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Bread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. melted margarine
1 c. pumpkin
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Mix by hand.
Sift dry ingredients together.
Make a well in center.
Add margarine and combine pumpkin, egg and water.
Mix until dry ingredients are moistened.
Pour into greased and floured 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until done.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for Pumpkin Spice Bread, which directly addresses the question about a good recipe for spiced pumpkin bread. The ingredients listed, including spices like cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves, are typical in a spiced pumpkin bread. The directions also give a clear method to follow, ensuring the user can make the bread with the provided information.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
2 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar, packed
4 eggs
1 c. salad oil
2 c. pumpkin (1 can)
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. allspice
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 tsp. salt
2/3 c. water
pinch of ginger
Directions:
Combine the first 4 ingredients, then add the pumpkin.
Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the first mixture. Bake in 2 greased and floured loaf pans for 1 hour at 350°.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for pumpkin bread, which involves pumpkin as an ingredient. However, it lacks specific mention of 'spiced' or the inclusion of additional spices, which are key components of the user's request for a 'spiced pumpkin bread'. The recipe should list spices or include directions for spicing the bread to fully address the question.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Bread
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
4 eggs, lightly beaten
1 can (16 oz.) solid-packed pumpkin
3 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
2 t. baking soda
1 t. baking powder
1 t. salt
1 t. ground cinnamon
1 t. ground nutmeg
1/2 t. ground cloves
1/2 t. ground allspice
1/2 c. water
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine sugar, oil and eggs.
Add pumpkin and mix well.
Combine dry ingredients; add to the pumpkin mixture alternately with water.
Pour into
two greased 9-in. 5-in.x3-in. loaf pans.
Bake at 350° for 60-70 minutes or until bread tests done.
Cool in pans 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack; cool completely.
Yields 2 loaves.
explanation: The answer provided is a recipe for Pumpkin Spice Bread, which directly addresses the user's request for a spiced pumpkin bread recipe. The ingredients listed include pumpkin and spices such as cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, and allspice, which are typical components of a spiced pumpkin bread. The directions also clearly detail the process of making the bread, from combining ingredients to baking and cooling. Therefore, the answer is fully relevant and useful to the user's question.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1/4 c. chopped green onion
1/2 tsp. basil, crumbled
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 c. melted butter
2 tsp. chicken seasoned stock base
2 Tbsp. flour
3/4 c. Chablis or other white wine
1/2 c. half and half
2 whole chicken breasts, halved and boned
1 Tbsp. margarine (for frying)
Directions:
Mix toasted wheat germ, onion, basil and garlic powder into melted butter.
Combine stock base and flour; gradually add wine and half and half.
Stir until smooth.
Add 1 tablespoon of this sauce to wheat germ mixture and set remainder aside.
Place chicken breast on a board, cover with waxed paper and flatten with a mallet.
Place equal amount of wheat germ stuffing in center of each chicken breast.
Roll breasts around stuffing.
Fasten with picks.
Brown chicken and place in a baking dish.
Pour sauce over chicken.
Bake at 400° for 45 to 50 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a step-by-step recipe for making stuffed chicken breasts, which directly addresses the user's question about how to prepare this dish. It includes all necessary ingredients, preparation steps, and cooking instructions, making the information both relevant and useful for the user.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 oz. Swiss cheese, diced
2 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
pinch of nutmeg
6 large boneless chicken breasts (about 2 lb.), pounded thin
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
2 c. Ragu chunky garden style spaghetti sauce with green peppers and mushrooms
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine cheese, eggs, bread crumbs, parsley, salt, pepper and nutmeg.
Place 1/4 cup cheese mixture in the center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with toothpicks.
In a large skillet, thoroughly brown chicken on all sides in hot oil; drain fat.
Pour spaghetti sauce over chicken.
Simmer, covered, 45 minutes or until chicken is done. Serves 6.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making stuffed chicken breasts, which directly addresses the user's question about how to prepare stuffed chicken breasts. All the necessary ingredients and cooking instructions are included, making it fully relevant and useful for someone looking to make this dish.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 oz. Mozzarella, diced
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
1/4 tsp. salt
6 large boneless chicken breasts (approximately 2 lb.), pounded thin
2 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. tomato sauce
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine cheese, eggs, crumbs, parsley, salt and pepper.
Place 1/4 cup of cheese mixture in center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with a toothpick.
explanation: The answer provided directly addresses the question about making stuffed chicken breasts. It lists the ingredients needed for the recipe, including the specified amount of mozzarella, eggs, and parsley. question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
6 skinless and boneless chicken breasts
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 chopped medium onion
1 chopped rib celery
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1 peeled carrot, chopped
3/4 c. seasoned bread crumbs
1/2 tsp. oregano
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
parsley, cayenne and paprika
Directions:
Pound breasts between two sheets of Saran Wrap to 1/8-inch thickness.
Saute onion, green pepper, carrot and garlic in butter until soft.
Add bread crumbs and 1/2 cup broth to mixture.
Salt and pepper to taste.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making stuffed chicken breasts, including all necessary ingredients and step-by-step instructions. It covers the essential elements of the question, making it completely relevant to the user's request.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
4 skinless chicken breasts
1/4 c. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. chopped bell pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
2/3 c. herb-seasoned stuffing mix
1/3 c. water
1/8 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 can cream of chicken soup
2 Tbsp. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. herb-stuffing mix
chopped parsley
Directions:
Flatten chicken breasts with a meat mallet.
Set aside.
Saute onion, green pepper and garlic in 2 tablespoons margarine.
Stir in 2/3 cup stuffing mix, water, salt and pepper.
Spread stuffing mixture evenly on each chicken breast.
Roll up chicken breast. Secure with wooden picks.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making stuffed chicken breasts, including a list of ingredients and step-by-step directions. It directly addresses the user's question on how to prepare stuffed chicken breasts, making it relevant and useful.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
4 oz. spaghetti (2 c., cooked)
1 can tuna in water, drained and flaked
1/2 c. cooked peas
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. wheat germ
Directions:
In small saucepan over medium-high heat, heat oil.
Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes.
Add tomato sauce and oregano; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer, stirring occasionally about 15 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a tuna pasta bake, which includes key ingredients like tuna, pasta, and peas, and gives a brief overview of the preparation steps. However, it lacks details on the creamy aspect of the recipe, which is a significant part of the user's question. The inclusion of cottage cheese and wheat germ suggests a creamy texture, but the explanation does not fully address the creaminess or elaborate on how to achieve it.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
4 slices sweet onion (thin)
4 slices red onion (thin)
1/2 lb. tuna, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 small tomatoes, sliced
1/4 c. black olives, sliced
2 Tbsp. basil (fresh), minced
2 tsp. garlic, minced
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 lb. linguine
2 Tbsp. capers, drained
Italian parsley sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy medium skillet over medium-low heat.
Add onions and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Add tuna, tomatoes, olives, basil, garlic, salt and pepper; cook until fish is opaque, stirring often, about 9 minutes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a tuna pasta dish, which includes ingredients and steps for cooking. However, it does not specify that the dish is a 'creamy tuna pasta bake'. The term 'bake' suggests that it should be prepared in an oven, which is not mentioned in the provided directions. question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta-Tuna Bake
Ingredients:
8 oz. (2 c.) macaroni shells, cooked and drained
2 cans (6 1/2 oz.) tuna, drained and chunked
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. milk
3 c. loosely packed parsley (1 bunch), thick stems removed
2/3 c. coarsely chopped green onions
Directions:
In greased 2-quart baking dish toss shells, tuna and celery. In blender mix mayonnaise, milk, parsley and green onions until smooth.
Pour over tuna mixture; toss to coat.
Bake in preheated 400° oven 15 minutes or until bubbly.
explanation: The provided answer addresses a recipe for a pasta dish with tuna, which is somewhat relevant to the question for a creamy tuna pasta bake. question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tuna Twist
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. vinegar
dash of pepper
4 oz. pasta twists, cooked and drained
1 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. chopped red onion
1/4 c. snipped dill or 1 Tbsp. dried dill weed
1 can tuna
Directions:
In large bowl, stir together first 3 ingredients until smooth. Add remaining ingredients; toss to coat well.
Cover.
Chill.
explanation: The answer provides a generic creamy pasta recipe using mayonnaise and tuna, which could be seen as a foundational element for a creamy tuna pasta bake. question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake(Microwave)
Ingredients:
6 strips cooked lasagna
1 small onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. flour
2 c. frozen vegetables
1 c. milk
1 1/2 c. shredded cheese
1 c. cottage cheese
1 egg
dash of black pepper
12 1/2 oz. can drained tuna
Directions:
Place lasagna in a 12 x 7-inch glass baking dish. Cover with water and set aside.
In 1-quart glass dish, combine onion, oil and flour. Cook on High power 1 minute. Stir to dissolve flour. Stir in vegetables and milk.
Cook on High for 4 minutes, stirring once. Combine cheese, cottage cheese, egg and pepper.
Drain lasagna.
In the same dish, layer half each lasagna, vegetables, cheese and tuna.
Repeat layers and top with remaining cheese. Cover and cook on High power 15 minutes or until hot.
Let stand 10 minutes or so.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a tuna pasta bake, which is relevant to the user's question about a creamy tuna pasta bake. However, the recipe described is for a microwave tuna pasta bake and does not explicitly mention making it 'creamy'. The ingredients and steps given are related but lack the specificity of 'creaminess' which could be implied by the type of cheese used, cooking method, or additional ingredients that may contribute to a creamy texture. Hence, it partially addresses the question.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cooking oil or melted butter
2 c. flour
Directions:
Take turns holding the mixer until eggs are fluffy.
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until smooth, but do not overmix. Grease hot griddle with shortening.
Pour batter to make 4 inch pancakes.
Cook until puffed, turn and cook other side until golden brown.
We like to cut them into shapes and spread butter and jelly.
explanation: The answer fully addresses the question by providing a clear recipe for making fluffy buttermilk pancakes. It lists all necessary ingredients, gives a step-by-step procedure, and even adds extra details like greasing the griddle and serving suggestions, which are relevant to making and enjoying the pancakes.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Favorite Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. soda
2 tsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 beaten egg
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. salad oil or melted shortening
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, sugar, soda and salt. Combine egg, milk and salad oil; add to dry ingredients, stirring just until flour is moistened (batter will be lumpy).
Bake on hot griddle.
Makes about 12 dollar size or eight (4-inch) pancakes.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for buttermilk pancakes, which is relevant to the question about making fluffy buttermilk pancakes. However, it does not specifically mention any tips or techniques to ensure the pancakes are fluffy. Therefore, while the answer addresses the general concept of making buttermilk pancakes, it omits key aspects related to achieving fluffiness.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. flour, sifted
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. shortening, melted
Directions:
Sift together the flour, salt, soda and sugar.
Beat egg with half the buttermilk.
Add to the dry ingredients and beat until smooth.
Slowly add the remaining buttermilk to make a thin batter, stirring constantly.
Mix in the melted shortening.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for buttermilk pancakes, which includes buttermilk as an ingredient. question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 whole egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and sugar in 1 bowl.
In another bowl, beat egg.
Add buttermilk, Wesson oil and vanilla.
Stir and add liquid ingredients to dry.
Stir, leaving entire ingredients slightly lumpy.
Bake on hot griddle (greased) until bubbles form.
Turn once and bake other side or place on waffle iron until lightly browned.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making buttermilk pancakes, which are relevant to the question about how to make fluffy buttermilk pancakes. It includes all necessary ingredients, measurements, and step-by-step instructions for preparing and cooking the pancakes, which are key aspects of achieving fluffiness in buttermilk pancakes.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 beaten eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. melted shortening
Directions:
Sift together the dry ingredients.
Add the remaining ingredients all at one time and mix.
Do not overbeat.
Batter should be lumpy.
explanation: The provided answer gives a recipe for buttermilk pancakes, which is relevant to the question about making fluffy buttermilk pancakes. question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Curried Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. curry powder
2 c. water
2 chicken broth cubes
1 c. uncooked rice
1 c. coconut milk
1/3 c. golden raisins
sliced onions, fried
Directions:
Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Stir in curry powder. Add water and broth cubes and bring to a boil. Add rice, coconut milk and raisins. Stir to blend.
Return to boil and then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Put into a serving dish and garnish with fried onions.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for Curried Coconut Rice, which includes some ingredients like coconut milk and curry powder that are relevant to making a creamy coconut curry sauce. However, it does not specifically guide on how to make a sauce, nor does it mention any key steps or techniques specific to creating a sauce, such as simmering, reducing, or achieving a creamy consistency. The provided instructions are more about cooking rice with these ingredients rather than focusing solely on creating a sauce.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Curried-Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen shrimp in shells
1 c. sifted all purpose flour
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 slightly beaten egg
2 Tbsp. salad oil
2/3 c. grated coconut
1-1/2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
Cook 1 pound shelled shrimp; drain.
In saucepan melt 1/4 cup butter or margarine.
Stir in 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour.
Add 1 1/2 cups milk all at once; cook and stir till thickened and bubbly.
Add shrimp, 1/4 cup dry sherry, 1/2 teaspoon salt, dash pepper, and dash paprika.
Pour into 5 coquilles (individual baking shells).
Sprinkle each serving with 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese.
Broil 3 to 4 inches from heat till cheese browns.
Makes 5 servings.
explanation: The provided answer outlines a recipe for Curried-Coconut Shrimp, which does involve coconut but does not specifically focus on creating a creamy coconut curry sauce. The answer includes shrimp and curry powder but lacks essential information and components necessary for a creamy coconut curry sauce, such as coconut milk, cream, or additional thickening agents. It also does not provide instructions for making a sauce that would be poured over a dish, which is a common aspect of a creamy coconut curry recipe.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
3/4 cube oleo
4 medium onions, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
9 garlic cloves, chopped
handful of celery leaves, chopped
10 dried chili peppers, crushed
1 1/2 tsp. cumin seed, crushed
4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cayenne
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
2/3 can tomato sauce
Directions:
Fry on medium-high heat the oil, all spices and celery leaves until absorbed by oil and not powder.
Add tomato sauce and cook until thick.
Skin and cup up chicken and put in large pot. Add sauce to chicken and simmer 20 to 25 minutes.
Add water to not quite halfway to the top of chicken.
Cover and simmer until done.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for a chicken curry, which includes several ingredients and steps that are relevant to making a curry sauce. question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry Surprises
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped, cooked chicken
2 Tbsp. chopped apple
2 Tbsp. chopped green onion
1 c. finely chopped peanuts
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. curry powder
dash of hot sauce
1 (7 oz.) bag shredded coconut
Directions:
Combine the chicken with the chopped apple, green onion, peanuts, mayonnaise, curry powder and hot sauce in large bowl, blending well.
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 4 hours or until chilled.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Panang Curry
Ingredients:
1 (14 oz.) can Taste of Thai coconut milk
1 Tbsp. Taste of Thai Panang Curry Base
1 lb. boneless chicken, cut in strips
2 Tbsp. Taste of Thai seasoning sauce
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 medium tomato, diced
1 yellow bell pepper, diced
3 scallions, diced
2 c. mushrooms, sliced
2 tsp. Taste of Thai garlic chili pepper sauce (use this cautiously; you might prefer a little less)
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine coconut milk and curry base and cook until blended over medium heat.
Add chicken, seasoning sauce and lemon juice and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients, except mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce.
Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce to taste.
Cover and simmer for 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lbs. Fish; firm and fresh, such as Swordfish,Shark, or Sea Bass, cut thick
1/3 c. Lime Juice
1/4 c. Tequila or White Wine
Directions:
Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tacos
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
1/4 tsp. salt
2 cans refried beans
1 small can Pet milk
1 onion
chili powder to taste
2 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
4 c. cheese
Directions:
Fry beef, onion, salt and chili powder together.
Drain. Blend refried beans and Ro-Tel tomatoes.
Add to beef.
Then add Pet milk and cheese.
Cook until cheese is melted.
Serve over corn chips.
Then top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes, onions, sour cream and taco sauce.
explanation: The provided answer does not address the user's question about making crispy fish tacos. Instead, it gives a recipe for creamy tacos using ground chuck, beans, and other ingredients, which is unrelated to the requested fish taco preparation.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Taco Salad(Quick And Easy!)
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger
corn chips
1 tomato, diced
1 (8 oz.) jar taco sauce
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 medium diced onion
shredded Cheddar cheese
1 head lettuce, shredded
3 Tbsp. soy sauce (light)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. rice vinegar
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. sesame oil
4 c. shredded lettuce
8 oz. flaked cooked fish
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
1/2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/4 c. chopped red cabbage
1/4 c. diagonally sliced green onions
1/4 c. thinly sliced celery
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
To make dressing, whisk first 6 ingredients together in a large bowl.
Add lettuce, fish and vegetables.
Toss with dressing.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:

Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. broccoli
1 c. sliced carrots
4 eggs
4 Egg Beaters
1 c. nonfat cottage cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. sliced mushrooms
6 thin slices tomato
1 Tbsp. Parmesan
Directions:
Steam broccoli and carrots for 10 minutes.
Beat together eggs, Egg Beaters, cottage cheese, salt and pepper.
Stir in carrots and broccoli and mushrooms.
Spray 10-inch round pan with Pam.
Pour in egg mixture.
Bake at 350° until eggs are cooked and knife inserted in center comes out almost clean.
Top with tomatoes; sprinkle with Parmesan.
Broil 1 to 2 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Western Style Frittata
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
4 oz. Canadian bacon, sliced and cut into strips
2 medium onions, sliced
1 bell pepper, chopped (optional)
7 eggs
1 1/2 c. grated Swiss cheese
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
season with pepper to taste
Directions:
In a 10-inch nonstick skillet, heat 2 tablespoons butter over low heat; add bacon and cook.
Add onions and green pepper, stirring frequently; cook about 5 minutes.
In medium bowl, beat eggs, cheese, pepper and bacon mixture until combined.
Melt 2 more tablespoons butter; add to egg mixture.
Cook on low heat until bottom is set.
Place in a preheated 300° oven.
Cook until desired consistency is reached, about 20 to 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Veggie-Topped Couscous
Ingredients:
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. olive oil or cooking oil
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
2 medium zucchini, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (2 1/2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium stewed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth
1 c. couscous
1/4 c. chopped unsalted dry roasted peanuts
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in hot oil over medium-low heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in carrots, 1/2 cup water, basil, cumin, salt and, if desired, red pepper.
Bring to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in zucchini, garbanzo beans and tomatoes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir together 2 tablespoons water and cornstarch.
Stir into tomato mixture.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?

butter
garlic powder

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Homemade Croutons
Ingredients:
dry bread
butter
Directions:
Trim the crusts from day-old bread.
Cut into cubes the size you want your croutons to be.
Place the cubes on an ungreased baking sheet and toast in a 350° oven until they are golden brown. In a large skillet, melt 2 tablespoons of butter at a time.
When the butter's foam begins to subside, add a batch of the toasted bread cubes and saute lightly on all sides.
Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towel.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Easy Make Croutons
Ingredients:

about 4 c. fresh bread cubes
dried herbs of your choice (basil, chives, pepper and parsley)
Directions:

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 eggs, separated
3/4 c. confectioners sugar
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate bits
5 Tbsp. cold water
pinch of salt
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Beat egg yolks and sugar until thick and lemon-colored.
Melt the chocolate with the water in a baking dish in a 350° oven for a few minutes.
Do not stir until chocolate is creamy.
Add egg yolks and sugar while chocolate is still warm.
Beat egg whites with pinch of salt until stiff.
Fold chocolate mixture into egg whites until there are no streaks.
Whip cream and add vanilla. Fold into chocolate mixture.
Spoon into serving bowl or individual cups.
Chill for 4 hours.
Serves 6.
explanation: The answer provides a complete, step-by-step recipe for making chocolate mousse, which directly addresses the user's question about how to make this dessert. It includes all necessary ingredients, proper measurements, and detailed instructions for the preparation process.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
5 (1 oz. each) sq. semi-sweet chocolate
2 (1 oz. each) sq. unsweetened chocolate
3 Tbsp. strong coffee
6 eggs
3 egg yolks
1 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. light rum
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
1/4 c. water
2 c. heavy or whipping cream
Directions:
In small saucepan, combine chocolates and coffee.
Heat over low heat until chocolates are melted.
Cool.
In a large mixer bowl, beat eggs and yolks on high speed 10 minutes.
Add sugar and beat until shiny, 5 minutes.
Add melted chocolates, rum and vanilla.
Beat just until thoroughly blended.
explanation: The answer provides a complete recipe for making chocolate mousse, which directly addresses the user's question. It includes a list of ingredients and detailed directions, making it a relevant and useful response for someone looking to make chocolate mousse.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 large egg yolks
3 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sugar
2 oz. semisweet chocolate
4 oz. milk chocolate
Directions:
Beat egg yolks in small bowl with electric mixer on high speed until thick and lemon colored, about 3 minutes. Gradually add sugar and beat on high speed. Heat 1 cup whipping cream in 2-qt. saucepan over medium heat just until hot (do not boil). Gradually stir half of the hot cream into egg yolk mixture; stir back into hot cream in saucepan. Cook over low heat about 5 minutes, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens (do not boil). Let cool for about 10 minutes. Add chocolate to egg yolk mixture and stir until mixture thickens and chocolate is well blended, about 5 minutes. Cover and refrigerate for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally, just until chilled. Beat 1 1/2 c. whipping cream in chilled medium bowl with electric mixer on high speed until stiff. Mix 3/4 c. of whipped cream into chocolate mixture until blended. Fold remaining whipped cream gradually into chocolate mixture until well blended. Pipe or spoon mixture into cups or small dessert bowls. Refrigerate any remaining dessert.
explanation: The answer is directly related to the user's question about making chocolate mousse. It provides a clear list of ingredients and a step-by-step process, making it highly relevant and useful for someone looking to prepare this dessert.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
1 pkg. semi-sweet chocolate pieces
1 Tbsp. flour
3 eggs, separated
1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. vanilla or rum
1 Tbsp. grated orange rind
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour and egg yolks; stir in milk; heav over low heat, stirring with whisk until mixture reaches consistency of mustard sauce.
Add butter, 1 tablespoon at a time, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat.
Add chocolate; stir until melted. Stir in vanilla or rum, and orange rind.
Cool slightly.
Add stiffly beaten egg whites and 1 cup of the cream, whipped stiff. Pour into sherbert dishes.
Chill about 5 hours, until firm.
Whip remaining cream as topping.
explanation: The answer provides a detailed recipe for making chocolate mousse, which directly addresses the user's question. It includes a list of ingredients and step-by-step instructions that are essential for preparing the dish.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
8 oz. semi-sweet chocolate bits
4 Tbsp. water
1/2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
4 egg yolks
4 egg whites
Directions:
Melt the chocolate and water together in a small pan.
Stir in the vanilla flavoring and butter, then the egg yolks, 1 at a time. Beat the egg whites until stiff.
Fold the chocolate mixture into the egg whites, using a rubber spatula or a metal spoon.
When thoroughly mixed, pour into a glass bowl.
Cover and chill overnight.
Serve with whipped cream on top.
explanation: The answer provided is directly relevant to the question. It gives a detailed recipe for making chocolate mousse, including the list of ingredients and step-by-step directions for preparation, which aligns with the user's request for how to make chocolate mousse.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Perfect Rolls
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
2 tsp. salt
2 pkg. yeast
1 egg
1 stick margarine
2 c. water
about 6 c. flour
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine sugar, salt, yeast and 2 cups flour. In pan, heat margarine and water until very warm (120° to 130°). Beat liquid into dry mixture until blended.
Increase speed to medium.
Beat 2 minutes.
Beat in egg.
Continue beating 2 minutes more.
With spoon, stir in remaining 3 to 4 cups flour to make a soft dough.
Turn on floured surface.
Knead 10 minutes.
Shape into ball.
Let rest 10 minutes.
Shape and raise 1 hour.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes in a 400° oven.
explanation: The provided answer gives a recipe for making perfect rolls, which does not address the user's question about how to make a soft-boiled egg. The ingredients and directions are entirely unrelated to cooking eggs.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Boiled Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
water
salt (brings water to a boil quicker)
Directions:
Put eggs in single layer in saucepan.
Add enough tap water to cover eggs about 1 inch.
Quickly bring water to boiling.
Boil on medium to high heat 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Let eggs stand covered in the hot water 10-15 minutes for large eggs. Run cold water over eggs until cooled.
To remove shell, gently tap all over.
Roll egg between the hands to loosen shell, then peel, starting at large end.
Hold egg under running cold water or dip in bowl of water to help ease off shell.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the question of making a soft-boiled egg. It lists the necessary ingredients (eggs and water, with the addition of salt for convenience), includes a step-by-step method on how to boil the eggs, specifies the time needed for cooking (2 to 3 minutes), and offers a tip on cooling the eggs down and peeling them afterward. All these elements contribute to achieving a perfect soft-boiled egg.

eggs

water (to cover)

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?

1 to 2 Tbsp. butter

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?

Title: Sweet Potatoes Roasted With Garlic
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
6 cloves garlic (unpeeled)
4 medium sweet potatoes, sliced
2 tsp. dried rosemary, crumbled
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:

In a small roasting pan, combine the oil and garlic and heat for 5 minutes.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 large sweet potatoes, peeled
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. honey
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Heat oven to 425 degrees. Grease baking pan. Cut sweet potatoes crosswise into 3/4 slices, halving larger sweet potatoes if necessary. Place in a single layer greased pan. In a small bowl combine oil, honey, rosemary and salt. Microwave on high for 20-30 seconds or until heated. Blend well. Brush mixture over sweet potatoes slices. Bake 425 degrees for 25-30 minutes or until sweet potatoes are tender.
explanation: The provided answer directly addresses the user's question of how to make roasted sweet potatoes. question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?

Title: Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
sweet potatoes
olive oil
salt
pepper
parsley
garlic powder

Bake 45 minutes more.
Turn oven to 425° for last 10 minutes, until potatoes are nice and crisp.
explanation: The answer provides a complete and straightforward method for making roasted sweet potatoes, which directly addresses the user's question. It lists the required ingredients and provides clear, step-by-step cooking directions, ensuring that the user can successfully prepare the dish.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. Honey
2 Tbsp. Grapeseed or Canola Oil
6 small Sweet Potatoes, scrubbed and halved
6 Cinnamon Sticks
Salt and freshly ground Pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
In small bowl, whisk together honey and oil.
Rub each sweet potato halve with honey and oil mixture.
Season potatoes with salt and pepper.
Press a cinnamon stick between matching halves of each sweet potato and wrap potatoes in foil.
Place on a baking sheet and roast for 30 min. Remove foil from potatoes and arrange skin side up on baking sheet.
Place cinnamon sticks next to potatoes and return to oven. Bake until potatoes and cinnamon sticks brown lightly; about 30 min.
Transfer to serving platter.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe for roasted sweet potatoes, including ingredients and step-by-step directions. It addresses the question by detailing how to make roasted sweet potatoes with the addition of cinnamon sticks, which still falls within the scope of the original question.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant In Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
4 c. fresh eggplant, peeled and cubed
2 medium white onions, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
3 garlic cloves, crushed
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, seeded and cubed
1 bay leaf
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 tsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. oregano
3 Tbsp. tomato paste
Directions:
In a large skillet, saute the eggplant, onions, pepper, garlic and salt in the olive oil.
Add tomatoes, bay leaf, dissolved chicken bouillon cube, vinegar and oregano.
Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add tomato paste and mix well.
Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove the lid, stir and discard bay leaf. Serve hot.
Makes 6 servings.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe using eggplant and tomatoes, directly addressing the user's question about what dishes can be made using these ingredients. It includes a list of ingredients and step-by-step cooking instructions, ensuring that someone looking to cook with eggplant and tomatoes can follow the recipe.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Dish
Ingredients:
1 small eggplant
4 medium tomatoes, sliced
2 medium size green peppers, chopped
2 medium onions, chopped
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1 (12 oz.) pkg. sharp Cheddar cheese, cut into 1/8-inch slices
Directions:
Cut eggplant into 1/4-inch slices. Cook in a small amount of boiling water for 5 to 10 minutes or until eggplant is tender. Drain well.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe involving eggplant, which is relevant to the question. However, it does not mention tomatoes, which are a key ingredient in the user's query. The recipe focuses on eggplant alone, omitting the significant aspect of combining eggplant with tomatoes.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Seasoned Eggplant
Ingredients:
Olive oil cooking spray
1 large eggplant, unpeeled, cubed
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped bell pepper
1 large tomato
6 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/2 tsp. dried thyme leaves
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/2 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Spray large skillet with cooking spray, heat over medium heat until hot.
Saute vegetables until crisp-tender.
Add herbs and red pepper and cook for 2 minutes.
Add broth to skillet and heat to boiling, reduce heat and simmer, covered, until vegetables are soft and most of the liquid is absorbed, for about 20 minutes.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe for Seasoned Eggplant, which includes eggplant as one of the main ingredients. However, it does not explicitly mention tomatoes, which were part of the user's question. question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant In Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
2 unpeeled eggplants
olive oil
1 onion, chopped
1/2 pepper, chopped (green)
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 can tomato sauce
2 diced tomatoes
3 diced and fried potatoes (optional)
Directions:
Slice eggplants.
Wash slices and sprinkle with salt.
Let sit aside.
Later, squeeze water out of eggplant and brown lightly in olive oil.
Set aside.
explanation: The answer provides a recipe that includes both eggplant and tomatoes, which are relevant to the question. question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Tomato And Eggplant Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (1 1/2 lb.) eggplant
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1 finely chopped onion
1/2 tsp. oregano leaves
1/2 c. crumbled saltines
6 medium tomatoes, sliced
1/2 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Boil eggplant in water and salt (sliced); drain and mash. Blend eggs, pepper, onion, oregano and saltines.
Slice tomatoes and spread over top, then sprinkle cheese.
Bake in a buttered casserole for 25 minutes at 375°.
explanation: The answer provides a specific recipe, the Tomato and Eggplant Casserole, which incorporates both eggplant and tomatoes as requested in the question. It gives clear instructions and ingredients, fulfilling the user's query for a cooking idea.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?

Ingredients:

1 onion, chopped
1 can tomato soup (no water)

potatoes, mashed
grated cheese (1/2 c.)
Directions:
Brown meat and onion.
Season to taste with salt, pepper and garlic.

Put in casserole dish and top with mashed potatoes.
Sprinkle with cheese.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?

Title: Italian Style Kale
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) pkg. fresh kale
1 medium can tomatoes, crushed
6 medium potatoes or small new potatoes

salt and pepper to taste

Directions:

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: White Bean, Kale And Roasted Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
nonstick vegetable oil spray
3 medium carrots, peeled and quartered lengthwise
2 large tomatoes, quartered
1 large onion, cut into 8 wedges
1/2 small butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cut lengthwise into 1/2 inch thick wedges
6 garlic cloves, unpeeled
1 Tbsp olive oil
6 cups or more canned vegetable broth (I use Knorr vegetarian vegetable bouillon)
4 cups finely chopped kale
3 large fresh thyme sprigs
1 bay leaf
1 - 15 oz. can great northern beans, drained
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray rimmed baking sheet with oil spray. Arrange carrots, tomatoes, onion, squash and garlic on baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Toss to coat. Bake until vegetables are brown and tender, stirring occasionally, about 45 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Kale Greens
Ingredients:
3 qt. water
3 lb. kale
1/4 lb. seasoning meat (fat back, lean salt pork, ham or smoked turkey pieces)
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place the meat in the water with the red pepper.
Cook with lid on for about 1 1/2 hours or until meat is tender.
Wash kale several times.
Trim off the root and heavier part of the leaf. Remove meat and put the kale in; cook until tender.
Replace the meat on top and heat thoroughly.
